tika-s0301t0:2_3: taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthanti.
tika-s0301t0:2_7: āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyāti.
tika-s0301t0:2_11: tadubhayaṃ anantarāyena aṭṭhakathāya parisamāpanatthanti idameva ca payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:2_14: Vatthuttayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasaṃbuddhiyā aparimeyyapabhāvo puññātisayoti bahuvidhantarāyepi
tika-s0301t0:2_22: agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:4_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa;
tika-s0301t0:6_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0301t0:6_6: bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso na hessatī”ti ca.
tika-s0301t0:7_3: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetaṃ payojanaṃ sādhetīti.
tika-s0301t0:7_7: atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva tāva sammāsambuddhassa thomanaṃ kātuṃ tammūlakattā
tika-s0301t0:7_12: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho.
tika-s0301t0:7_13: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
tika-s0301t0:7_16: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibandhatīti attho.
tika-s0301t0:8_1: byāpādāratīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca sattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārapavattiyā mettāmuditānampi cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati,
tika-s0301t0:8_2: tathāpi paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā parūpatāpāsahanarasā avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇāva visesena bhagavato
tika-s0301t0:8_4: Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0301t0:9_0: Atha vā chaasādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya savisayabyāpitāya
tika-s0301t0:9_1: mahākaruṇābhāvamupagatā karuṇāva bhagavato abhisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti āha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti.
tika-s0301t0:10_0: Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ sātisaye hadayasītibhāvanibandhanatte sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya
tika-s0301t0:10_5: ca sannihitesupi sattasaṅghāṭasamupanītahadayūpatāpanimittesu na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti.
tika-s0301t0:10_6: Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0301t0:11_2: Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto.
tika-s0301t0:11_8: Sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanakaraṇato andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti tamo.
tika-s0301t0:11_11: Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena avijjandhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhādhimuttehi viya
tika-s0301t0:11_12: diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso
tika-s0301t0:11_13: vijjatīti sātisayena avijjāppahānena bhagavantaṃ thomento āha “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
tika-s0301t0:12_0: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
tika-s0301t0:12_1: tathā sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā,
tika-s0301t0:12_2: parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena
tika-s0301t0:12_4: Imasmiñca atthavikappe “paññāpajjoto”ti padena bhagavato paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena,
tika-s0301t0:13_0: Atha vā bhagavato ñāṇassa ñeyyapariyantikattā sakalañeyyadhammasabhāvāvabodhanasamatthena anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātena
tika-s0301t0:13_1: paññāpajjotena sabbañeyyadhammasabhāvacchādakassa mohandhakārassa vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato
tika-s0301t0:13_3: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sasantāne mohatamavidhamananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:13_5: parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato phalūpacārena anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “mohatamavidhamana”nti vuccatīti.
tika-s0301t0:14_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ gayhati,
tika-s0301t0:14_3: Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi,
tika-s0301t0:15_0: Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā saṃsārappavattiyā
tika-s0301t0:15_1: ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto vutto eva hotīti vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
tika-s0301t0:16_2: sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti sanarāmaraloko,
tika-s0301t0:16_5: Etena devamanussānaṃ viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakārataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:16_9: Edisesu hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:16_11: garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā garukaraṇasamatthasseva sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0301t0:16_12: So hi lokīyanti ettha puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:17_3: sanarā ca te amarā cāti sanarāmarā,
tika-s0301t0:17_4: tesaṃ lokoti sanarāmaralokoti purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Amara-
tika-s0301t0:17_8: Tathā hi sabbānatthapariharaṇapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā
tika-s0301t0:17_10: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:18_1: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:19_0: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalamapi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena sammā gato avagatoti sugato,
tika-s0301t0:19_1: tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato,
tika-s0301t0:19_2: lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato,
tika-s0301t0:19_3: lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
tika-s0301t0:19_5: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”tiādinā nayena ayamattho vibhāvetabboti.
tika-s0301t0:20_2: Yasmā vā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva ca dhammaṃ bhāsati,
tika-s0301t0:20_3: tasmā sammā gadati vadatīti sugato da-
tika-s0301t0:21_3: Tā hi sakalassapi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena nivattitattā bhagavā
tika-s0301t0:21_4: pañcahipi gatīhi suṭṭhu mutto visaṃyuttoti āha “gativimutta”nti.
tika-s0301t0:24_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0301t0:25_0: Taṃtaṃgatisaṃvattanakānañhi kammakilesānaṃ aggamaggena bodhimūleyeva suppahīnattā natthi bhagavato gatipariyāpannatāti
tika-s0301t0:26_0: Atha vā gativimuttanti anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā bhagavantaṃ thometi.
tika-s0301t0:26_1: Ettha hi dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā attahitasampattito parahitapaṭipattito ca.
tika-s0301t0:26_7: Sā panettha āsayato payogato ca duvidhā parahitapaṭipatti,
tika-s0301t0:26_8: tividhā ca attahitasampatti pakāsitā hoti, kathaṃ?
tika-s0301t0:26_14: avasiṭṭhatthena tena “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etena ca sabbāpi attahitasampatti parahitapaṭipatti pakāsitā hotīti.
tika-s0301t0:27_0: Atha vā tīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā –
tika-s0301t0:27_4: Phalaṃ catubbidhaṃ ñāṇasampadā pahānasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti.
tika-s0301t0:27_5: Tāsu ñāṇapahānasampadā dutiyapadena saccapaṭivedhatthena ca sugata-
tika-s0301t0:27_10: Upakāro anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ karitvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā.
tika-s0301t0:28_1: Mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-s0301t0:28_2: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:28_9: antadvayarahitāya karuṇāpaññāpariggahitāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā pakāsanato sugata- saddassa.
tika-s0301t0:28_15: tadubhayena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:29_0: Ettha ca karuṇāgahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato sabbalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā hoti,
tika-s0301t0:29_5: Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā karuṇāya,
tika-s0301t0:29_7: Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0301t0:29_9: paññāgahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ catusaccañāṇaṃ catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:29_10: karuṇāgahaṇena mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇassa gahitattā sesādhāraṇañāṇāni cha abhiññā aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni
tika-s0301t0:29_11: dasa balāni cuddasa buddhañāṇāni soḷasa ñāṇacariyā aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni
tika-s0301t0:29_12: sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:30_2: Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti.
tika-s0301t0:30_3: Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti.
tika-s0301t0:30_9: paññā pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato dassitattā.
tika-s0301t0:30_10: Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo,
tika-s0301t0:30_12: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:35_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenapi buddaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:36_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ “buddhopī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:37_2: bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā niddesanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:37_4: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena.
tika-s0301t0:37_5: Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato kammavacanicchāya
tika-s0301t0:37_6: abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti buddho yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:37_7: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhastaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇā
tika-s0301t0:37_9: “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi.
tika-s0301t0:37_10: Tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāva”nti. Api-
tika-s0301t0:37_12: Tena “evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā”ti vakkhamānaguṇe dhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0301t0:37_25: Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyato saṃsārato ca apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
tika-s0301t0:38_1: evaṃ vividhaguṇagaṇasamannāgato buddhopi bhagavā yaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0301t0:38_2: pana dhammaṃ sacchikatvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigato,
tika-s0301t0:38_3: tametaṃ buddhānampi buddhabhāvahetubhūtaṃ sabbadosamalarahitaṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena anuttaraṃ paṭivedhasaddhammaṃ namāmīti.
tika-s0301t0:38_6: tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pariyattidhammassapi sacchikiriyasammasanapariyāyo labbhatīti sopi idha vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:39_0: Tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā sacchikatvā”ti ca vuttattā buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi pāramitāhi saha pubbabhāge adhisīlasikkhādayopi idha dhamma-
tika-s0301t0:39_2: Tāpi hi malapaṭipakkhatāya gatamalā anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttarā cāti.
tika-s0301t0:39_3: Tathā hi sattānaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthāya katamahābhinīhāro mahākaruṇādhivāsapesalajjhāsayo
tika-s0301t0:39_4: paññāvisesaparidhotanimmalānaṃ dānadamasaññamādīnaṃ uttamadhammānaṃ satasahassādhikāni kappānaṃ cattāri
tika-s0301t0:39_5: asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesānaṃ bhāvanāpaccakkhakaraṇehi kammādīsu adhigatavasibhāvo
tika-s0301t0:39_6: acchariyācinteyyamahānubhāvo adhisīlādhicittānaṃ paramukkaṃsapāramippatto bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena
tika-s0301t0:40_0: Ettha ca “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0301t0:40_20: Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0301t0:40_31: Bhāvanābalena hi so dosānaṃ samugghātako hotīti.
tika-s0301t0:40_34: Tathā “bhāvetvā”ti etena saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā honti.
tika-s0301t0:40_35: “Sacchikatvā”ti etena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0301t0:41_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ “sugatassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:41_6: Tena kilesapahānameva bhagavato orasaputtabhāve kāraṇaṃ anujānātīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:41_8: Tena ca satipi tesaṃ sattavisesabhāvena anekasahassasaṅkhābhāve imaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ nātivattantīti dasseti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvānativattanato.
tika-s0301t0:41_11: Tena asatipi ariyapuggalānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyaṃ ariyasaṅghabhāvaṃ dasseti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:42_0: Tattha urasi bhavā jātā saṃbaddhā ca orasā.
tika-s0301t0:42_1: Yathā hi sattānaṃ orasaputtā attajātatāya pitu santakassa dāyajjassa visesena bhāgino honti,
tika-s0301t0:42_2: evametepi ariyapuggalā sammāsambuddhassa dhammassavanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa
tika-s0301t0:42_3: vimuttisukhassa ariyadhammaratanassa ca ekantabhāginoti orasā viya orasā.
tika-s0301t0:42_4: Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāveneva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamamānā okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato urena
tika-s0301t0:42_5: vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya nippariyāyena orasā puttāti vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-s0301t0:42_6: Sāvakehi pavattiyamānāpi hi dhammadesanā “bhagavato dhammadesanā”icceva vuccati tammūlikattā lakkhaṇādivisesābhāvato ca.
tika-s0301t0:43_0: Yadipi ariyasāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāyakaraṇatthaṃ devaputtamāro,
tika-s0301t0:43_2: tehi pana apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe vimathite tepi vimathitā eva nāma hontīti āha “mārasenamathanāna”nti.
tika-s0301t0:43_3: Imasmiṃ panatthe “māramārasenamathanāna”nti vattabbe mārasenamathanānanti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:43_4: Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassapi guṇamāraṇe sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo “senā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:43_7: anantabhedā vā kilesavāhinī satidhammavicayavīriyasamathādiguṇapaharaṇehi odhiso vimathitā vihatā viddhastā cāti mārasenamathanā,
tika-s0301t0:44_3: Atha vā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato upagantabbato,
tika-s0301t0:44_6: Ariyo ca so saṅgho cāti vā ariyasaṅgho.
tika-s0301t0:44_7: Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti assa ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ
tika-s0301t0:45_0: Ettha ca “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0301t0:45_4: Atha vā sugatassa orasānaṃ puttānanti ariyasaṅghassa visuddhanissayabhāvadīpanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:45_8: Tathā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0301t0:45_9: Lokuttarasaraṇagamanena hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā.
tika-s0301t0:45_10: “Mārasenamathanāna”nti etena abhinīhārasampadāya siddhaṃ pubbabhāge sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:45_11: Katābhinīhārā hi sammāpaṭipannā māraṃ māraparisaṃ vā abhivijinanti.
tika-s0301t0:45_12: “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena paṭividdhastavipakkhe sekkhāsekkhadhamme dasseti puggalādhiṭṭhānena maggaphaladhammānaṃ pakāsitattā.
tika-s0301t0:45_16: asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā saṅkhepato sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0301t0:46_1: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ
tika-s0301t0:46_5: Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjentassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0301t0:47_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0301t0:47_5: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha.
tika-s0301t0:51_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhantīti.
tika-s0301t0:52_1: Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā,
tika-s0301t0:52_8: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā taṃ puññaṃ atthappakāsanassa upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ vihanane samatthanti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:53_1: Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakāre payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā dhammadesanāya atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo,
tika-s0301t0:53_3: devatāsaṃyuttādisaṃyuttehi ceva naḷavaggādivaggehi ca vibhūsitassāti attho.
tika-s0301t0:53_8: evaṃ atthesu ca katāvadhiko padasamudāyo vākyaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:53_13: Yadipi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato natthi,
tika-s0301t0:53_14: avayave eva taṃtaṃsannivesavisiṭṭhe upādāya padādisamaññā viya suttavaggasamaññā saṃyuttasamaññā āgamasamaññā ca,
tika-s0301t0:53_15: tathāpi paramatthato avijjamānopi samudāyo buddhiparikappitarūpena vijjamāno viya gayhamāno avayavānaṃ
tika-s0301t0:54_3: Bhavati hi abhinnepi vatthusmiṃ yathādhippetavisesāvabodhanato bhedakasamudācāro yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
tika-s0301t0:54_6: ādikalyāṇādiguṇasampattiyā uttamaṭṭhena taṃtaṃabhipatthitasamiddhihetutāya paṇḍitehi varitabbato varo,
tika-s0301t0:54_7: āgamo ca so varo cāti āgamavaro.
tika-s0301t0:54_9: saṃyutto ca so āgamavaro cāti saṃyuttāgamavaro, tassa.
tika-s0301t0:54_11: buddhānaṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā.
tika-s0301t0:55_0: Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca buddhānubuddhāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:55_1: Sammāsambuddheneva hi vinayasuttaabhidhammānaṃ pakiṇṇakadesanādivasena yo paṭhamaṃ attho vibhatto,
tika-s0301t0:55_2: so eva pacchā tesaṃ atthavaṇṇanāvasena saṅgītikārehi saṅgahaṃ āropitoti.
tika-s0301t0:55_3: Ettha ca saṃyuttānaṃ vaggā samūhāti saṃyuttavaggā,
tika-s0301t0:56_0: Tattha sagāthāvagge tāva ekādasa saṃyuttāni aṭṭhatiṃsa vaggā.
tika-s0301t0:57_3: yadidaṃ taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanānaṃ ādito tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa visesaguṇakittanena thomanā.
tika-s0301t0:57_7: tassa gambhīrañāṇehi ogāḷhassa abhiṇhaso nānānayavicittassa abhidhammassā”tiādinā thomanā katā.
tika-s0301t0:58_6: Chaḷabhiññatāya paramena cittavasibhāvena samannāgatattā jhānādīsu pañcavidhavasitāsambhāvato ca vasino,
tika-s0301t0:58_10: Saṅgītāti atthaṃ kathetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayaṃ etassa attho,
tika-s0301t0:59_4: tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassa ca sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:59_7: Aparabhāge hi nikāyantaraladdhīhi asaṅkaratthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitāti.
tika-s0301t0:59_8: Tena mūlaṭṭhakathā sabbasādhāraṇā na hotīti idaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ ekantena karaṇīyanti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:59_11: sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ vā atthāya sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti yojanā.
tika-s0301t0:61_3: Aviruddhattā eva hi theravādāpi idha pakāsīyissanti.
tika-s0301t0:61_7: tappariyāpannā hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato theravaṃsadīpā,
tika-s0301t0:61_12: Atha vā vinicchinotīti vinicchayo vuttappakāravisayaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:61_13: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:61_15: tato eva ca aviparīto saṇho sukhumo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayo,
tika-s0301t0:62_5: Tena ca “tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi atthāyā”ti ayamattho siddho hoti uggahaṇādisukaratāya tesampi bahukārattā.
tika-s0301t0:62_8: Idañhi atthappakāsanaṃ aviparītapadabyañjanasunikkhepassa atthasunayassa ca upāyabhāvato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā pavattati.
tika-s0301t0:62_11: dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0301t0:64_1: “Na idha bhiyyo vitthārakathaṃ karissāmī”ti sāmaññato vuttassa atthassa avassayaṃ dassetuṃ “suttānaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:65_2: tadekadesabhāvena visuddhimaggo gahetabboti kathikānaṃ upadesaṃ karonto tatta vicāritadhamme uddesavasena dasseti “sīlakathā”tiādinā.
tika-s0301t0:65_6: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti niravasesāni yogakammassa bhāvanāya pavattiṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0301t0:66_2: Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā paññāya saṅkaletvā sampiṇḍetvā nicchayo paññāsaṅkalananicchayo.
tika-s0301t0:69_1: Idāni tasseva avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhārento “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:69_2: Tattha “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhaṭṭhabhāvadīpanena visesato catunnaṃ āgamānaṃ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggo,
tika-s0301t0:69_4: “Visesato”ti ca idaṃ vinayābhidhammānampi visuddhimaggo yathārahaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti evāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:70_0: 19. Iccevāti iti eva. Tampīti visuddhimaggampi. Etāyāti sāratthappakāsiniyā.
tika-s0301t0:71_0: Ettha ca “sīhaḷadīpaṃ ābhatā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathākaraṇassa nimittaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0301t0:71_1: “dīpavāsīnamatthāya sujanassa ca tuṭṭhatthaṃ ciraṭṭhitatthañca dhammassā”ti etehi payojanaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:71_4: Heṭṭhimanikāyesu visuddhimagge ca vicāritānaṃ atthānaṃ avicāraṇampi hi idha karaṇappakāro evāti.
tika-s0301t0:74_0: Vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanavaseneva hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva saṃyuttavaggasuttādivasena
tika-s0301t0:74_5: Tatthāti vā “etāya aṭṭhakathāya vijānātha saṃyuttanissitaṃ attha”nti ettha yaṃ saṃyuttaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, tattha.
tika-s0301t0:75_0: Idāni taṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇetukāmo attano saṃvaṇṇanāya tassa paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkameneva pavattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0301t0:75_2: Tattha yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti,
tika-s0301t0:75_3: mahāvisayattā pūjaniyattā ca mahatī saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti.
tika-s0301t0:76_0: Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:76_9: ādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:76_10: Kāmañcettha yassaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkamena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo,
tika-s0301t0:76_12: sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ pana attanā vitthāritattā tattheva gahetabbāti imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya mahattaṃ pariharanto “sā panesā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:77_1: Evaṃ bāhiranidāne vattabbaṃ atidisitvā idāni abbhantaranidānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “yaṃ paneta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:77_2: Tattha yasmā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena saṃvaṇṇetabbe dhamme padavibhāgaṃ padatthañca dassetvā tato paraṃ piṇḍatthādidassanavasena saṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā,
tika-s0301t0:77_3: tasmā padāni tāva dassento “evanti nipātapada”nti- ādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:77_6: Atha vā padāni ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgo.
tika-s0301t0:77_7: Padaviggaho ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgoti vā ekasesavasena padapadaviggahā padavibhāgasaddena vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:77_8: Tattha padaviggaho “jetassa vanaṃ jetavana”ntiādinā samāsapadesu daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t0:78_1: Taṃ pana padatthaṃ atthuddhārakkamena paṭhamaṃ evaṃsaddassa dassento “evaṃsaddo tāvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:78_9: Tathā hi gatavidhaākārasadde lokiyā pakāratthe vadanti.
tika-s0301t0:78_10: “Evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassū āmuttamālābharaṇā odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti,
tika-s0301t0:78_11: seyyathāpi tvaṃ etarahi sācariyakoti. No hidaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:79_0: Nanu ca “evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā,
tika-s0301t0:79_2: saddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃ- saddoti? Na,
tika-s0301t0:79_8: “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni upamādīsu udāharaṇāni upapannāni honti.
tika-s0301t0:79_15: maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena sattena kattabbāti jotitattā puppharāsimālāguḷāva upamā,
tika-s0301t0:79_19: so pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamāva hotīti āha “upamāyaṃ āgato”ti.
tika-s0301t0:79_20: Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya ākappasampattiyā yo tattha upadisanākāro,
tika-s0301t0:79_25: evametaṃ sugatā”ti ettha ca bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0301t0:80_5: evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:80_6: bhanteti pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāre sanniyojitehi bhikkhūhi attano tattha ṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanavasena vuttattā ettha evaṃ-
tika-s0301t0:80_12: evaṃ samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehīti yo evaṃ vadanākāro idāni vattabbo, so evaṃ-
tika-s0301t0:80_14: Evaṃ noti etthāpi nesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatigahaṇavasena “saṃvattanti vā no vā,
tika-s0301t0:80_15: kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-
tika-s0301t0:80_17: So pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno avadhāraṇattho hotīti āha –
tika-s0301t0:81_2: Nayā vā pāḷigatiyo tā ca paññattianupaññattiādivasena saṃkilesabhāgiyādilokiyāditadubhayavomissakādivasena
tika-s0301t0:81_3: kusalādivasena khandhādivasena saṅgahādivasena samayavimuttādivasena ṭhapanādivasena kusalamūlādivasena
tika-s0301t0:81_7: te ca sassatādibhedena tattha ca apparajakkhatādibhedena aneke,
tika-s0301t0:81_8: attajjhāsayādayo eva vā samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu etassāti anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:81_11: chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatanti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t0:82_0: Vividhapāṭihāriyanti ettha pāṭihāriyapadassa vacanatthaṃ “paṭipakkhaharaṇato rāgādikilesāpanayanato pāṭihāriya”nti vadanti.
tika-s0301t0:82_1: Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi ye haritabbā,
tika-s0301t0:82_2: puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0301t0:82_3: tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:82_4: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā,
tika-s0301t0:82_7: Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
tika-s0301t0:82_9: Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti.
tika-s0301t0:82_10: Paṭīti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,
tika-s0301t0:82_12: tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchāharitabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:82_13: attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:82_14: iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
tika-s0301t0:82_15: haritesu ca attano upattilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti,
tika-s0301t0:82_17: Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:82_18: Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0301t0:82_22: Tassa pana iddhiādibhedena visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāyaṃ labbhamānattā āha “vividhapāṭihāriya”nti.
tika-s0301t0:83_0: Na aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathāti attho,
tika-s0301t0:83_3: Evañca katvā “sabbappakārena ko samattho viññātu”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0301t0:83_5: Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnampi atthānaṃ ekavisayattā.
tika-s0301t0:83_6: Itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho asamattho cāti āpajjeyyāti.
tika-s0301t0:84_1: so attā”ti evaṃ vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya sasantatiyā vattanato tividhopi me-
tika-s0301t0:84_2: saddo kiñcāpi ekasmiṃ eva atthe dissati,
tika-s0301t0:85_2: saddo eva taṃ taṃ attaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa suta-
tika-s0301t0:85_3: saddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ na virujjhatīti dassento “saupasaggo anupasaggo cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:85_5: Kammabhāvasādhanāni idha sutasadde sambhavantīti vuttaṃ “upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti vā attho”ti.
tika-s0301t0:85_9: Mamāti atthe satīti yadā sambandhavasena sāminiddeso, tadā.
tika-s0301t0:86_2: saddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ “evanti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassana”nti. Ādi-
tika-s0301t0:86_3: saddena sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pañcadvārikaviññāṇānaṃ tadabhinīhaṭānañca manodvārikaviññāṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:86_4: Sabbesampi vākyānaṃ evakāratthasahitattā “suta”nti etassa sutamevāti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti.
tika-s0301t0:86_8: Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti sutanti asutaṃ na hotīti ayametassa atthoti vuttaṃ “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti.
tika-s0301t0:88_0: Evaṃ savanahetusavanavisesavasena padattayassa ekena pakārena atthayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni pakārantarehi taṃ dassetuṃ “tathā eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:88_1: Tattha tassāti yā sā bhagavato sammukhā dhammassavanākārena pavattā manodvāraviññāṇavīthi, tassā.
tika-s0301t0:88_2: Sā hi nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattetuṃ samatthā.
tika-s0301t0:88_8: Sutanti dhammappakāsananti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi nānappakārena pavattā,
tika-s0301t0:89_0: Evanti niddisitabbappakāsananti nidassanatthamevaṃ saddaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ nidassetabbassa niddisitabbattābhāvābhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:89_2: saddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti dasseti. Suta-
tika-s0301t0:89_3: saddassa kiriyāsaddattā savanakiriyāya ca sādhāraṇaviññāṇappabandhapaṭibaddhattā tattha ca puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ “sutanti puggalakiccappakāsana”nti.
tika-s0301t0:89_4: Na hi puggalavohārarahite dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhatīti.
tika-s0301t0:90_1: saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathā atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:90_2: Tattha ākārapaññattīti upādāpaññatti eva dhammānaṃ pavattiākārupādānavasena tathā vuttā.
tika-s0301t0:90_3: Sutanti visayaniddesoti sotabbabhūto dhammo savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:90_4: Cittasantānavinimuttassa paramatthato kassaci kattu abhāvepi saddavohārena buddhiparikappitabhedavacanicchāya
tika-s0301t0:90_5: cittasantānato aññaṃ viya taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā vuttaṃ “cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgīno”ti.
tika-s0301t0:90_6: Savanakiriyāvisayopi sotabbadhammo savanakiriyāvasena pavattacittasantānassa idha paramatthato kattubhāvato,
tika-s0301t0:90_7: savanavasena cittappavattiyā eva vā savanakiriyābhāvato taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti vuttaṃ “taṃsamaṅgīno kattuvisaye”ti.
tika-s0301t0:91_0: Pubbe sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa nidassanassa,
tika-s0301t0:91_2: saddoti tadākārādiupadhāraṇassa puggalapaññattiyā upādānabhūtadhammappabandhabyāpāratāya vuttaṃ “evanti puggalakiccaniddeso”ti.
tika-s0301t0:91_3: Savanakiriyā pana puggalavādinopi viññāṇanirapekkhā natthīti visesato viññāṇabyāpāroti āha “sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti.
tika-s0301t0:91_4: Meti saddappavattiyā ekanteneva sattavisayattā viññāṇakiccassa ca tattheva samodahitabbato “meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:91_15: kattuniddesavasena ca dutiyādayo catasso atthayojanā dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:92_0: Sabbassapi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca vijjamānādivasena
tika-s0301t0:92_1: chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tesu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ sarūpaṃ niddhārento āha “evanti ca
tika-s0301t0:92_3: Tattha evanti ca meti ca vuccamānassa atthassa ākārādino dhammānaṃ asalakkhaṇabhāvato avijjamānapaññattibhāvoti
tika-s0301t0:92_8: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti,
tika-s0301t0:92_10: ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvo vā attho saccikaṭṭho paramattho cāti vuccati,
tika-s0301t0:92_11: na tathā evaṃ meti padānaṃ atthoti.
tika-s0301t0:92_14: Teneva hi “yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:92_15: Sotadvārānusārena upaladdhanti pana vutte atthabyañjanādi sabbaṃ labbhatīti.
tika-s0301t0:92_16: Taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbatoti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādino paccāmasanavasena evanti,
tika-s0301t0:92_17: sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe upādāya meti vattabbattāti attho.
tika-s0301t0:92_18: Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko viya paṭhamādīni
tika-s0301t0:92_19: diṭṭhamutaviññāte apekkhitvā pavattoti āha “diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbato”ti.
tika-s0301t0:92_20: Asutaṃ na hotīti hi sutanti pakāsitoyamatthoti.
tika-s0301t0:93_0: Attanā paṭividdhā suttassa pakāravisesā evanti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti āha “asammohaṃ dīpetī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:93_1: Nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho hotīti etena vakkhamānassa suttassa nānappakārataṃ duppaṭivijjhatañca dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:93_2: Sutassa asammosaṃ dīpetīti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:93_6: Byañjanānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro nātigambhīro yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
tika-s0301t0:93_7: paññā tattha guṇībhūtāti vuttaṃ “paññāpubbaṅgamāyā”tiādi paññāya pubbaṅgamāti katvā.
tika-s0301t0:93_9: Pubbaṅgamatāya vā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādīnaṃ viya appadhānatte paññā pubbaṅgamā etissāti ayampi attho yujjati,
tika-s0301t0:93_10: evaṃ sati pubbaṅgamāyāti etthāpi vuttavipariyāyena yathāsambhavaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:93_15: akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesavasena chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatassāti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t0:94_2: Avikkhepaṃ dīpetīti “oghataraṇasuttaṃ kattha bhāsita”ntiādipucchāvasena pakaraṇappavattassa vakkhamānassa
tika-s0301t0:94_3: suttassa savanaṃ samādhānamantarena na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:94_8: saddhammassavanena viya ca avikkhepassa yathā yonisomanasikārena phalabhūtena attasammāpaṇidhipubbekatapuññatānaṃ siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato,
tika-s0301t0:94_9: evaṃ avikkhepeneva phalabhūtena kāraṇabhūtānaṃ saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ siddhi dassetabbā
tika-s0301t0:94_11: “Na hi vikkhittacitto”tiādinā samatthanavacanena pana avikkhepena kāraṇabhūtena sappurisūpanissayena
tika-s0301t0:94_14: saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ bāhiraṅgattā.
tika-s0301t0:94_15: Avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa ekantakāraṇanti,
tika-s0301t0:94_17: no na samatthitā vikkhittacittānaṃ sappurisapayirūpāsanābhāvassa atthasiddhito.
tika-s0301t0:94_18: Ettha ca purimaṃ phalena kāraṇassa siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa.
tika-s0301t0:94_19: Dutiyaṃ kāraṇena phalassa siddhidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ekantavassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
tika-s0301t0:95_16: Sammāpaṇihitatto pubbe ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti tadasuddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvatoti āha “āsayasuddhi siddhā hotī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:95_27: Parisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hotīti.
tika-s0301t0:96_6: vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva sotabbadhammavisesaṃ āmasatīti dīpeti.
tika-s0301t0:96_7: Manodiṭṭhīhi pariyattidhammānaṃ anupekkhanasuppaṭivedhā visesato manasikārapaṭibaddhāti te vuttanayena yonisomanasikāradīpakena evaṃ saddena yojetvā,
tika-s0301t0:96_8: savanadhāraṇavacīparicayā pariyattidhammānaṃ visesena sotāvadhānapaṭibaddhāti te vuttanayena avikkhepadīpakena suta-
tika-s0301t0:96_9: saddena yojetvā dassento sāsanasampattiyā dhammassavane ussāhaṃ janeti.
tika-s0301t0:96_14: ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā nayena manasā anupekkhitā.
tika-s0301t0:96_16: ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:97_0: Sakalena vacanenāti pubbe tīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ yojitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:97_4: “Idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ anariyavohārāvatthaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:97_10: “Evaṃ me suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho vibhāvitoti dassanato.
tika-s0301t0:97_11: Keci pana “devatānaṃ parivitakkāpekkhaṃ tathāvacananti edisī codanā anavakāsā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0301t0:97_12: Tasmiṃ kira khaṇe ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bhagavā ca parinibbuto,
tika-s0301t0:97_13: ayañca āyasmā desanākusalo idāni dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-s0301t0:97_15: Kiṃ nu kho sayaṃ sacchikataṃ dhammaṃ deseti?
tika-s0301t0:98_2: Assaddhiyaṃ vināsetīti bhagavatā bhāsitattā sammukhāvassa paṭiggahitattā khalitaduruttādigahaṇadosābhāvato ca.
tika-s0301t0:98_3: Ettha ca paṭhamādayo tisso atthayojanā ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-
tika-s0301t0:98_7: Pacchimā pana tisso yathākkamaṃ ākāratthaṃ nidassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇatthañca evaṃ-
tika-s0301t0:99_2: Tathā hesa “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0301t0:99_3: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati.
tika-s0301t0:99_8: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhayāyaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:99_12: Tathāgatuppādādiko hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso tappaccayassa paṭilābhahetuttā.
tika-s0301t0:99_14: yo khaṇoti ca samayoti ca vuccati,
tika-s0301t0:99_19: Tattha hi nisinnā titthiyā attano attano samayaṃ pavadanti.
tika-s0301t0:99_22: abhisamayo attho abhisamayatthoti pīḷanādīni abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttāni.
tika-s0301t0:99_23: Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūto attho abhisamayatthoti tāneva tathā ekattena vuttāni.
tika-s0301t0:99_24: Tattha pīḷanaṃ dukkhasaccassa taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:100_0: Tattha sahakārikāraṇaṃ sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo.
tika-s0301t0:100_1: Sameti samāgacchati ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo.
tika-s0301t0:100_6: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:100_7: saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo,
tika-s0301t0:100_10: Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo,
tika-s0301t0:100_12: Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati,
tika-s0301t0:100_13: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi.
tika-s0301t0:100_18: sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo apavatti samayo, pahānaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:100_19: Abhimukhaṃ ñāṇena sammā etabbo adhigantabboti abhisamayo,
tika-s0301t0:100_21: Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
tika-s0301t0:100_23: Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddappavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0301t0:100_24: Samayasaddassa atthuddhāre abhisamayasaddassa udāharaṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:100_26: Kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato desadesakaparisānaṃ viya suttassa nidānabhāvena kālassa apadisitabbato ca.
tika-s0301t0:101_2: Utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamaṃ akatvā samayasaddassa vacane ayampi guṇo laddho hotīti dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:101_8: Yathāvuttappabhedesu eva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “yo cāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:102_6: Tattha yathā kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññāto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ
tika-s0301t0:102_7: tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato “pubbaṇhe jāto,
tika-s0301t0:102_9: samūho ca avayavavinimutto visuṃ avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati yathā “rukkhe sākhā,
tika-s0301t0:102_14: dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0301t0:102_15: tasmiṃ eva kāle dhammapuñje ca phassādayopi hontīti ayaṃ hi tattha attho.
tika-s0301t0:102_19: tasmiṃ samayeti ca vutte “satī”ti ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvatoti samayassa
tika-s0301t0:102_20: sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā phassādibhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyati.
tika-s0301t0:102_23: paccayasamavāye vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0301t0:102_25: paccayasamavāye vā phassādayopi hontīti ubhayattha samayasadde bhummaniddeso kato lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti dassento āha “khaṇa…pe…
tika-s0301t0:103_4: Vītikkamañhi sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā ca
tika-s0301t0:103_5: taṃ taṃ vatthuotiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadāni paññapento bhagavā viharati sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
tika-s0301t0:105_5: na pana idha vattabbo visuddhimaggassa imissā aṭṭhakathāya ekadesabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:107_0: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-s0301t0:108_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”.
tika-s0301t0:109_1: Ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā,
tika-s0301t0:109_2: te anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā tathāgate atthi upalabbhanti.
tika-s0301t0:109_3: Tathā hissa sīlaṃ samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:109_85: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo anantāparimāṇabhedā
tika-s0301t0:109_86: anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti upalabbhanti,
tika-s0301t0:109_87: tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti “bhāgavā”ti vattabbe ākārassa rassattaṃ katvā “bhagavā”ti vutto.
tika-s0301t0:112_1: Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi
tika-s0301t0:112_19: te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na honti,
tika-s0301t0:112_21: evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti “bhatavā”ti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vutto niruttinayena ta-
tika-s0301t0:112_24: Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakaradhamme vuttanayeneva bhari, sambhari,
tika-s0301t0:114_0: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato”.
tika-s0301t0:115_2: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ vani, bhaji, sevi,
tika-s0301t0:115_4: Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu kusalādīsu khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
tika-s0301t0:115_12: “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā,
tika-s0301t0:115_16: Atha vā “ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā,
tika-s0301t0:115_17: kinti nu kho te vineyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya”nti mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi,
tika-s0301t0:117_0: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tato”.
tika-s0301t0:118_1: Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ bhajīyantīti bhagā,
tika-s0301t0:118_3: Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sammāsambodhito pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate, vani, bhaji, sevi,
tika-s0301t0:118_4: yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato buddhakaradhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi,
tika-s0301t0:118_5: buddhabhūto pana te niravajjesu upasaṃhite anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi, vani, bhaji, sevi,
tika-s0301t0:118_13: uttarimanussadhammavasena ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe, bhage, vani, bhaji, sevi.
tika-s0301t0:119_0: “Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthu;
tika-s0301t0:120_0: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato”.
tika-s0301t0:121_1: Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā.
tika-s0301t0:121_7: yathābhuccaguṇādhigatena “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattena lokattayabyāpinā suvipulena suvisuddhena
tika-s0301t0:121_8: ca thutighosena samannāgatattā ukkaṃsapāramippattāsu appicchatāsantuṭṭhiādīsu suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato dasabalacatuvesārajjādi-
tika-s0301t0:121_13: dhammappamāṇo dhammappasannoti evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā
tika-s0301t0:121_15: Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti,
tika-s0301t0:121_16: kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ pasādabhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā.
tika-s0301t0:121_17: Tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti,
tika-s0301t0:125_6: taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca. –
tika-s0301t0:126_0: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0301t0:128_0: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:129_1: Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi aparimāṇāsu jātīsu pāramiyo paripūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri,
tika-s0301t0:129_3: carimattabhāvepi hatthagataṃ cakkavattisiriṃ devalokādhipaccasadisaṃ catudīpissariyaṃ cakkavattisampattisannissayaṃ
tika-s0301t0:129_4: sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
tika-s0301t0:129_5: tasmā ime sirīādike bhage vamīti bhagavā.
tika-s0301t0:129_9: tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsisattāvāsasamatikkamato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti.
tika-s0301t0:132_3: tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena pathaviyādivasena atītādivasena ca anekavidhā,
tika-s0301t0:132_4: te ca bhagavā sabbaṃ papañcaṃ sabbaṃ yogaṃ sabbaṃ ganthaṃ sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amatadhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri,
tika-s0301t0:132_6: Tathā hesa “sabbatthakameva pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:132_7: cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ manaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:132_8: rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme,
tika-s0301t0:132_24: dhammavicāra”ntiādinā anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri,
tika-s0301t0:132_28: taṃ tathāgato puna paccāvamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:132_30: Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri,
tika-s0301t0:134_0: Kaṇhasukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato”.
tika-s0301t0:136_0: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-s0301t0:137_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
tika-s0301t0:138_1: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
tika-s0301t0:138_2: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo vijjatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:138_4: Na hi bhagavato rūpakāye kenaci sakkā antarāyaṃ kātunti.
tika-s0301t0:138_5: Desanāsampattiṃ niddisati vakkhamānassa sakalassa suttassa “eva”nti nidassanato.
tika-s0301t0:138_6: Sāvakasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāppattena pañcasu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitena mayā mahāsāvakena sutaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:138_8: na anussutaṃ na paraṃparābhatanti imassatthassa dīpanato.
tika-s0301t0:138_9: Kālasampattiṃ niddisati bhagavāsaddasannidhāne payuttassa samayasaddassa buddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0301t0:142_9: Tathā hi taṃ “idhekacco gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati sahanandī sahasokī”tiādīsu iriyāpathavihāre āgataṃ. “Yasmiṃ,
tika-s0301t0:142_12: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti ettha dibbavihāre.
tika-s0301t0:142_13: “So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādīsu brahmavihāre.
tika-s0301t0:142_16: tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃ eva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmi,
tika-s0301t0:143_3: Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vā.
tika-s0301t0:143_4: Atha vā iriyati pavattati etena attabhāvo kāyakiccaṃ vāti iriyā,
tika-s0301t0:143_5: tassā pavattiupāyabhāvato iriyā ca so patho cāti iriyāpatho,
tika-s0301t0:143_7: So ca atthato gatinivattiādiākārena pavatto catusantatirūpapabandho eva.
tika-s0301t0:143_16: dibbo ca so vihāro cāti dibbavihāro,
tika-s0301t0:143_24: So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanantiādi yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0301t0:143_25: tathāpi upādinnakasarīrassa nāma ayaṃ sabhāvoti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:143_26: Yasmā vā bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto vineyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento,
tika-s0301t0:143_27: nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento vasatīti sattānaṃ attano ca vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ harati upaneti uppādeti,
tika-s0301t0:143_28: tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:144_3: Rañño vā paccatthikānaṃ jitakāle jātattā jeto.
tika-s0301t0:144_4: Rañño hi attano jayaṃ tattha āropetvā jitavāti jetoti kumāro vutto.
tika-s0301t0:144_8: Vanetiādito paṭṭhāyeva taṃ tassa santakanti dassetuṃ “taṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:144_9: Sabbakāmasamiddhitāya vigatamalamaccheratāya karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya ca niccakālaṃ upaṭṭhapito anāthānaṃ piṇḍo etassa atthīti anāthapiṇḍiko,
tika-s0301t0:144_15: Yadipi so bhūmibhāgo koṭisantharena mahāseṭṭhinā kīto,
tika-s0301t0:144_16: rukkhā pana jetena na vikkītāti taṃ “jetavana”nti vattabbataṃ labhatīti vadanti.
tika-s0301t0:144_18: jetenapi hi bhūmibhāgavikkayena laddhadhanaṃ tattha dvārakoṭṭhakakaraṇavasena viniyuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:144_19: Sāvatthijetavanānaṃ bhūmibhāgavasena bhinnattā vuttaṃ “na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekaṃ samayaṃ viharitu”nti.
tika-s0301t0:145_1: Abhiññātānampi aññatarasaddo dissateva ekasadisāyattattāti dassetuṃ “abhijānāti no”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:145_9: purisasaṇṭhānassa pana purisavesassa ca vasena purisapuggalātveva vuccanti purisapakatibhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:146_2: Teneva hi “nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo”ti upari vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:146_4: Tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha “sundare dissatī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:146_9: Yasasāti iminā edisena parivārena paricchadena ca.
tika-s0301t0:146_13: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti sabbāpi disā pabhāsento cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho.
tika-s0301t0:147_1: Chavigatā pana vaṇṇadhātu eva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo”ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare.
tika-s0301t0:147_5: Vaṇṇīyati phalaṃ etena yathāsabhāvato vibhāvīyatīti vaṇṇo, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:147_9: Vaṇṇeti vikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti vaṇṇo,
tika-s0301t0:147_11: Evaṃ tena tena pavattinimittena vaṇṇasaddassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe pavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0301t0:147_12: Iddhiṃ māpetvāti vatthālaṅkārakāyādīhi obhāsamuñcanādivasena dibbaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ nimminitvā.
tika-s0301t0:147_18: Na tena iriyāpathakappanaṃ hotīti etena brahmalokepi brahmāno yebhuyyena nimmitarūpeneva pavattantīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:147_19: Itarañhi ativiya sukhumaṃ rūpaṃ kevalaṃ cittuppādassa nissayādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ saṇṭhānavantaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0301t0:149_0: Kappasaddo panāyaṃ saupasaggo anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappaniyapade labbhamānaṃ kappasaddamattaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0301t0:149_10: Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenacipi kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā,
tika-s0301t0:149_11: ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-
tika-s0301t0:149_15: Bhagavato ābhāya anobhāsitameva hi padesaṃ devatā attano pabhāya obhāsenti.
tika-s0301t0:149_16: Na hi bhagavato pabhā kāyaci pabhāya abhibhuyyati,
tika-s0301t0:150_0: Yena vā kāraṇenāti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:150_5: vijjāya vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthameva taṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:150_11: Sampattakāmatāya hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami,
tika-s0301t0:151_0: Gatinivattiatthato sāmaññato āsanampi ṭhānaggahaṇena gayhatīti vuttaṃ “āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ tiṭṭhantī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:151_1: Nisinnāpi hi gamanato nivattā nāma honti ṭhatvā nisīditabbattā,
tika-s0301t0:151_4: Taṃ pana avakaṃsato ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthasaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:152_2: So pana taraṇākāro atthato kāraṇamevāti āha “kathaṃ nūti kāraṇapucchā”ti?
tika-s0301t0:153_5: Saṅkunā saṅkūti matthakato samakoṭṭitena yāva hadayapadesā nibbijjhitvā otiṇṇena saṅkunā pādatalato samakoṭṭito
tika-s0301t0:153_6: saṅku nibbijjhitvā ārohanto hadaye hadayassa padese samāgaccheyya,
tika-s0301t0:153_7: atha nesaṃ saṅkūnaṃ samāgamasamakāle naṃ yathātikkantasaṅkukaraṇakālaṃ jāneyyāsi.
tika-s0301t0:153_8: Kiñci nimittaṃ upādāya kismiñci atthe pavattassa saddassa tannimittarahite pavatti ruḷhī nāma gamanakiriyārahite
tika-s0301t0:154_1: te gaṇanaparicchedato sarūpato ca dassetuṃ “cattāro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:154_2: Kasmā panettha cattāro eva oghā vuttā,
tika-s0301t0:154_5: yasmā dhammānaṃ sabhāvakiccavisesaññunā bhagavatā sabbaṃ ñeyyaṃ yāthāvato abhisambujjhitvā ettakāva oghā desitā,
tika-s0301t0:154_10: Ayañca attho “sabbopi cesā”tiādinā parato aṭṭhakathāyameva āgamissati.
tika-s0301t0:154_12: kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena ogho cāti,
tika-s0301t0:154_14: Bhavogho nāma bhavarāgoti dassetuṃ “rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:154_20: catusaccantogadhattā sabbassa ñeyyassa “catūsu saccesu aññāṇaṃ avijjogho”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:155_0: Idāni tesaṃ oghasaṅkhātānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:155_2: “Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgo kāmogho”ti ettha bhavoghaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbo lobho kāmoghoti yuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0301t0:155_3: Sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo bhavadiṭṭhisampayuttattā bhavoghoti aṭṭhakathāsu vutto,
tika-s0301t0:155_4: bhavogho pana diṭṭhigatavippayuttesu eva uppajjatīti pāḷiyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0301t0:155_10: Kāmāsavaniddese ca kāmesūti kāmarāgadiṭṭhirāgādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūtesu tebhūmakesu vatthukāmesūti attho sambhavati.
tika-s0301t0:155_11: Tattha hi uppajjamānā sāyaṃ taṇhā sabbāpi na kāmacchandādināmaṃ na labhatīti.
tika-s0301t0:156_0: Yadi pana pañcakāmaguṇiko ca rāgo kāmoghoti vuttoti katvā brahmānaṃ vimānādīsu rāgassa diṭṭhirāgassa ca kāmoghabhāvo paṭisedhitabbo siyā,
tika-s0301t0:156_1: evaṃ sati kāmoghabhavoghavinimuttena nāma lobhena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:156_3: tadā tena sampayutto avijjogho oghavippayuttoti domanassavicikicchuddhaccasampayuttassa viya tassapi
tika-s0301t0:156_4: oghavippayuttatā vattabbā siyā “catūsupi diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatesu cittuppādesu uppanno moho
tika-s0301t0:156_7: “kāmoghaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhogho avijjogho”ti ca vacanato diṭṭhisahagato kāmogho na hotīti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:156_8: Tathā hettha “rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti ca bhavogho nāmāti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:157_5: sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭattā pana sabbassapi bhavassa uparīti vattabbataṃ arahatīti katvā vuttaṃ “uparibhavaṃ nibbāna”nti.
tika-s0301t0:157_7: saddoti “mahā heso kilesarāsī”ti vuttaṃ sesesupīti bhavoghādīsupi.
tika-s0301t0:158_2: Anāyūhantoti abhisaṅkhārādivasena na āyūhanto majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ vilaṅghitvā nibbuyhanto. Tenāha –
tika-s0301t0:158_9: Āyūhantāti hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyamantā.
tika-s0301t0:159_0: Idāni yenādhippāyena bhagavatā tathāgūḷhaṃ katvā pañho kathito,
tika-s0301t0:160_0: Soti devaputto nihatamāno ahosi yathāvissajjitassa atthassa ajānanto.
tika-s0301t0:160_2: taṃsambandhañca kathanti pucchāvacananti tadubhayassa atthaṃ dassento “yathāhaṃ jānāmi,
tika-s0301t0:161_10: Ṭhāne ca vāyāme cāti vakkhamānavibhāge patiṭṭhahane vāyāme ca dosaṃ disvāti patiṭṭhānāyūhanesu saṃsīdananibbuyhanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0301t0:161_15: Atiṭṭhanto avāyamantoti patiṭṭhānāyūhanakaraṇakilesādīnaṃ parivajjanena asaṃsīdanto anibbuyhanto.
tika-s0301t0:161_16: Devatāyapi paṭividdho tadattho upanissayasampannatāya vimuttiparipācanīyadhammānaṃ paripakkattā.
tika-s0301t0:161_20: Satta dukā idāni vuccamānarūpā dassitā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:161_21: Kilesavasena santiṭṭhantoti lobhādīhi abhibhūtatāya saṃsāre patiṭṭhahanto sammā appaṭipajjanena tattheva saṃsīdati nāma.
tika-s0301t0:161_22: Abhisaṅkhāravasenāti tatthevābhisaṅkhāracetanāya cetento sammāpaṭipattiyogyassa khaṇassa ativattanena nibbuyhati nāma.
tika-s0301t0:162_0: Ettha ca vaṭṭamūlakā kilesāti tesaṃ vasena saṃsāre avaṭṭhānaṃ taṃtaṃkammunā tattha tattha bhave abhinibbatti,
tika-s0301t0:162_2: Tattha tattha bhave aparāparaṃ nibbattento saṃsāre nibbuyhati nāmāti imassa atthassa dassanavasena paṭhamaduko vutto.
tika-s0301t0:162_3: Ime sattā saṃsāre paribbhamantā duvidhā taṇhācaritā diṭṭhicaritā cāti tesaṃ saṃsāranāyikabhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ vasena santiṭṭhanaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:162_4: tadaññesaṃ pavattipaccayānaṃ vasena āyūhananti imassa atthassa dassanavasena dutiyaduko vutto.
tika-s0301t0:162_5: Saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādadassanasabhāvāya taṇhāya vasena visesato patiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:162_6: amuttimagge muttimaggaparāmāsato tathā āyūhanampi diṭṭhiyā vasena hotīti dassetuṃ tatiyaduko vutto.
tika-s0301t0:162_7: Catutthaduke pana adhippāyo aṭṭhakathāya eva vibhāvito.
tika-s0301t0:162_9: asaññūpagaṃ vā avimokkhaṃyeva vimokkhoti gahetvā saṃsāre eva olīyati.
tika-s0301t0:162_11: Yasmā pana kāmabhavādīsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā bhavaṃ patvā attā ucchijjati vinassati,
tika-s0301t0:162_12: na hoti paraṃ maraṇāti abhinivisanto bhavavippamokkhāvahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanena taṃ ativattati.
tika-s0301t0:163_0: Līnavasena santiṭṭhantoti kosajjādivasena saṃkocāpajjanena sammā appaṭipajjanto.
tika-s0301t0:163_1: Uddhaccavasena āyūhantoti sammāsamādhino abhāvena vikkhepavasena pañcamo duko vutto.
tika-s0301t0:163_2: Yathā kāmasukhaṃ paviṭṭhassa samādhānaṃ natthi cittassa upakkiliṭṭhattā,
tika-s0301t0:163_4: Iti cittakāyaparikkilesakarā dve antā taṇhādiṭṭhinissayatāya saṃsīdananibbuyhananimittā vuttā chaṭṭhaduke.
tika-s0301t0:163_5: Pubbe sappadesatova saṃkilesadhammā “saṃsīdananimitta”nti dassitāti idāni nippadesato dassanavasena,
tika-s0301t0:163_6: pubbe ca sādhāraṇato abhisaṅkhāradhammā “nibbuyhananimitta”nti dassitāti idāni puññāneñjābhisaṅkhāre
tika-s0301t0:163_8: Evañhi duggatisugatūpapattivasena saṃsīdananibbuyhanāni vibhajja dassitāni hontīti.
tika-s0301t0:163_10: Adhobhāgaṃ duggatiṃ gamentīti adhobhāgaṅgamanīyā anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0301t0:164_0: Ettha ca oghataraṇaṃ pucchitena bhagavatā “appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha”nti tassa pahānaṅgameva dassitaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:164_10: tasmā appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena pavattamāno tathāpavattihetūvāti ayamettha attho.
tika-s0301t0:164_11: Khoti ca avadhāraṇatthe nipāto “assosi kho”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0301t0:164_15: Anāyūhanampi hi ekaṃsikamevāti tassa paṭipakkho saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo.
tika-s0301t0:164_19: devatā ca sahavipassanaṃ maggaṃ paṭivijjhīti paṭhamaphale patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0301t0:165_0: “Cirassā”ti iminā samānatthaṃ padantarametanti āha “cirassa kālassā”ti yathā “mamaṃ vā,
tika-s0301t0:165_1: bhikkhave”ti ettha “mamā”ti iminā samānatthaṃ padantaraṃ mamanti.
tika-s0301t0:165_3: Adassāvitā ca disvā kattabbakiccassa asiddhatāya veditabbā.
tika-s0301t0:165_7: Dassanaṃ upādāya evaṃ vattuṃ vattatīti yadā kadāci kañci piyajātikaṃ disvā taṃ dassanaṃ upādāya “cirena
tika-s0301t0:165_8: vata mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ passāmā”ti adiṭṭhapubbaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ vā evaṃ vattuṃ yujjati,
tika-s0301t0:165_12: Kilesanibbānenāti kilesānaṃ accantasamucchedasaṅkhātena nibbānena nibbutaṃ sammadeva vūpasanta-
tika-s0301t0:166_9: visālā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe visatā vitthatāti visattikā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:167_0: Tattha visatāti vitthatā rūpādīsu tebhūmakadhammesu abhibyāpanavasena visaṭāti purimavacanameva ta-
tika-s0301t0:167_6: Ratto hi rāgavatthunā pādena tāḷiyamānopi sahatīti.
tika-s0301t0:167_10: Visaṃ haratīti tathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ passantī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito cittaṃ saṃharati saṃkhipati,
tika-s0301t0:167_15: Visaṃ vā dukkhābhibhūtā vedanā mūlaṃ etissāti visamūlā.
tika-s0301t0:167_21: taṃ dassetuṃ puna “visālā vā panā”tiādi vuttanti evamettha visattikāpadassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:170_1: Sā pana atthavaṇṇanā yasmā desanāya samuṭṭhānappayojanabhājanesu piṇḍatthesu ca niddhāritesu sukarā hoti suviññeyyā ca,
tika-s0301t0:170_6: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ abbhantarasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma lokanāthassa mahākaruṇā.
tika-s0301t0:170_7: Tāya hi samussāhitassa bhagavato veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ udapādi,
tika-s0301t0:170_9: “sattesu ca kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:170_10: Ettha ca hetuavatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva saṃsāramahoghato saddhammadesanāhatthadānehi sattasantāraṇatthaṃ taduppattito.
tika-s0301t0:170_12: evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dasabalañāṇādīni ca desanāya abbhantarasamuṭṭhānabhāvena vattabbāni.
tika-s0301t0:170_13: Sabbañhi ñeyyadhammaṃ tesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ sattānañca āsayānusayādiṃ yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu
tika-s0301t0:170_17: Tadajjhesanuttarakālañhi dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇājanitaṃ appossukkataṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi.
tika-s0301t0:170_19: Tattha abbhantaraṃ yāya mahākaruṇāya yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:170_20: tadubhayaṃ veditabbaṃ bāhiraṃ pana tassā devatāya pucchā,
tika-s0301t0:171_1: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ anukkamena yāva anupādāparinibbānaṃ vimuttirasattā bhagavato desanāya.
tika-s0301t0:171_6: Sace pana veneyyasantānagatampi desanābalasiddhisaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanabhāvato yathādhippetatthasiddhiyā
tika-s0301t0:172_0: Apica tassā devatāya oghataraṇākārassa yāthāvato anavabodho imissā desanāya samuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:172_2: So hi imāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ payojeti tannipphādanaparāyaṃ desanāti katvā.
tika-s0301t0:172_4: taṃ ākaṅkhitabbattā desakaṃ desanāya payojetīti payojananti vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:172_5: Tathā devatāya tadaññesañca vineyyānaṃ patiṭṭhānāyūhanavissajjanañcettha payojanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:172_8: nirākaraṇaṃ sammāvādapurekkhāro akusalamūlasamūhananaṃ kusalamūlasamāropanaṃ apāyadvārapidahanaṃ saggamokkhadvāravivaraṇaṃ
tika-s0301t0:172_10: titthiyasamayanimmathanaṃ buddhadhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīnipi payojanāni idha veditabbāni.
tika-s0301t0:173_1: tādisā aññe ca saṅkhātadhammānaṃ sammāsambuddhassa ca paṭipattiṃ ajānantā asaddhammassavana- dhāraṇa- paricaya-
tika-s0301t0:173_3: paricayavimukhā ca bhavavimokkhesino vineyyā imissā desanāya bhājanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:174_0: Piṇḍatthā pana “appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha”nti padadvaye catusaccakammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro
tika-s0301t0:174_4: taṇhuppādupādānaviyogo cetokhilavivecanaṃ abhinandananivāraṇaṃ saṃsaggātikkamo vivādamūlapariccāgo akusalakammapathaviddhaṃsanaṃ
tika-s0301t0:175_0: Tattha yesaṃ kilesādīnaṃ vasena patiṭṭhāti saṃsīdati,
tika-s0301t0:175_5: “appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha”nti adhippetassa atthassa paṭicchannaṃ katvā desanā upāyo mānaniggaṇhanavasena tassā
tika-s0301t0:175_7: antadvayarahitā majjhimā paṭipatti paṭipajjitabbāti ayamettha bhagavato āṇattīti ayaṃ desanāhāro.
tika-s0301t0:176_0: Parasaṃsayapakkhandanatāya ñātukāmatāya ca kathaṃ nūti pucchāvasena vuttaṃ?
tika-s0301t0:176_2: Paramukkaṃsagatassa garubhāvassa anaññayogyassa saddhammadhurassa paridīpanato sādhūti marisasīlādiguṇatāya “mārisā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:176_4: Ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa katattā pariyosāpitattā “itī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:176_5: Saṃsīdanalakkhaṇassa patiṭṭhānassa akātabbato sabbaso ca akatattā.
tika-s0301t0:176_7: Tayidaṃ akaraṇaṃ ekaṃsikanti khoti avadhāraṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:176_8: Tassa ca appatiṭṭhānassa sasantatigatattā “tva”nti ca pucchitattā “aha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:176_11: Nibbuyhanalakkhaṇassa āyūhanassa akātabbato sabbaso ca akatattā anāyūhanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:176_12: Tiṇṇākārassa oghānaṃ anicchitabhāvato eva tattha saṃsayassa anapagatattā oghataraṇassa ca avisesattā “yathā kathaṃ panā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:176_13: Tathā saṃsīdanalakkhaṇaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ saṃsāre ca saṇṭhānanti anatthantarattā abhinnakālikaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:176_14: Tathā nibbuyhanalakkhaṇaṃ āyūhanaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ativattananti anatthantarattā abhinnakālikanti vuttaṃ “yadā svāhaṃ…pe…
tika-s0301t0:176_16: Tadubhayassa paṭipakkhabhāvato paṭibāhanato ca oghātiṇṇāti vuttaṃ “evaṃ khvāhaṃ…pe…
tika-s0301t0:177_3: Bāhitapāpato brahmassa ca ariyamaggassa aṇanato paṭivijjhanato “brāhmaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:177_4: Kilesasantāpavūpasamanato dukkhasantāpavūpasamanato ca sabbaso nibbutattā “parinibbuta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:177_5: Taraṇapayogassa nibbattitattā upari taritabbābhāvato ca “tiṇṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:177_6: Ñāṇacakkhunā oloketabbato lujjanato palujjanato ca “loke”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:177_10: Paṭhamaṃ gahitattā paccāmasanato ca “sā devatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:177_13: Cakkhupathātikkamena tirobhāvūpagamanato “antaradhāyī”ti vuttanti ayaṃ anupadavicayato vicayahāro.
tika-s0301t0:178_4: sassatādivasena santiṭṭhato saṃsāre saṃsīdanaṃ hotīti yujjati kāraṇassa suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:178_6: atidhāvanābhinivesādīnaṃ vasena āyūhantassa saṃsāramahoghena nibbuyhanaṃ hotīti yujjati sammāpaṭipattiyā ativattanato.
tika-s0301t0:178_7: Brahmassa ariyamaggassa aṇanato paṭivijjhanato brāhmaṇabhāvo yujjjati bāhitapāpattā.
tika-s0301t0:178_8: Sammadeva santadhammasamadhigamato parinibbutabhāvo yujjati sabbaso savāsanapahīnakilesattā.
tika-s0301t0:178_9: Tathā ca visattikāya tiṇṇabhāvo yujjati yathā yāya lesopi na dissati,
tika-s0301t0:178_10: evaṃ aggamaggena tassā samucchinnattāti ayaṃ yuttihāro.
tika-s0301t0:180_6: Iminā nayena yathārahaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhādivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvo vattabbo.
tika-s0301t0:181_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti patiṭṭhānāyūhanapaṭikkhepena vissajjentena niyyānāvahā sammāpaṭipatti gahitā ekantato oghanittharaṇūpāyabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:181_1: Taggahaṇena ca sabbepi sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā gahitā honti niyyānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattāti ayaṃ lakkhaṇahāro.
tika-s0301t0:182_0: Nidānamassā devatāya oghataraṇākārassa yāthāvato anavabodhoti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0301t0:182_1: Aññepi ye imaṃ desanaṃ nissāya oghataraṇūpāyaṃ paṭivijjhanti,
tika-s0301t0:182_3: “Kathaṃ nu kho imaṃ desanaṃ nissāya sammadeva paṭivijjhantā catubbidhampi oghaṃ tarantā sakalasaṃsāramahoghato nitthareyyuṃ,
tika-s0301t0:182_4: pare ca tattha patiṭṭhapeyyu”nti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:182_6: taṃ “eva”ntiādinidānapadānaṃ “katha”ntiādipāḷipadānañca aṭṭhakathāya tassā līnatthavaṇṇanāya ca vuttanayānusārena
tika-s0301t0:183_8: yā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pucchānusandhi ajjhāsayānusandhi yathānusandhī”ti tidhā vibhattā.
tika-s0301t0:183_9: Ajjhāsayo cettha attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayoti dvidhā veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:184_0: “Kasmā panettha oghataraṇasuttameva paṭhamaṃ nikkhitta”nti nāyamanuyogo katthaci na pavattati?
tika-s0301t0:184_2: vā majjhimāya paṭipadāya vibhāvanato sabbapaṭhamamidaṃ suttaṃ idha nikkhittaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:184_3: Antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimāya paṭipattiyā saṅkāsanaparañhi buddhānaṃ sāsananti.
tika-s0301t0:184_4: Yaṃ pana ekissā desanāya desanantarena saddhiṃ saṃsandanaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:191_0: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-s0301t0:194_0: Te pahāya tare oghaṃ, nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragū. ;
tika-s0301t0:196_0: Etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti. –
tika-s0301t0:197_0: Evamādīhi desanāhi saṃsandatīti ayaṃ catubyūho hāro.
tika-s0301t0:198_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha saṃkilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ āyūhanañca.
tika-s0301t0:198_4: Tesu taṇhāgahaṇena ca taṇhāmūlakā dhammā āvattanti.
tika-s0301t0:198_6: Yonisomanasikāraggahaṇena ca yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā āvattanti catubbidhañca sampatticakkaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:198_10: samādhiggahaṇena pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi pañcaññāṇiko sammāsamādhi samādhiparikkhārā ca āvattanti.
tika-s0301t0:198_11: Paññāgahaṇena paññā ca sammādiṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhisudassanā sabbepi ariyamaggadhammā āvattantīti ayaṃ āvatto hāro.
tika-s0301t0:200_0: Pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ sammadeva sampādetvā samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā bhāvanaṃ ussakkento kilesādīnaṃ
tika-s0301t0:200_1: dūrīkaraṇato tesaṃ vasena asaṃsīdanto anibbuyhanto appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ oghaṃ tarati.
tika-s0301t0:200_2: Kilesādīnaṃ vasena pana saṃsīdanto nibbuyhanto saṃsāre patiṭṭhānato āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā āyūhanato oghaṃ na taratīti ayaṃ parivatto hāro.
tika-s0301t0:201_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ asantiṭṭhanto asaṃsīdanto anibbisaṃ anavinibbisanti pariyāyavacanaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:201_4: Iminā nayena sesapadesupi pariyāyavacanaṃ veditabbanti ayaṃ vevacano hāro.
tika-s0301t0:202_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhaṃ āyūhanti kilesānaṃ kiccakaraṇapaññatti.
tika-s0301t0:203_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhānāyūhanaggahaṇena oghaggahaṇena ca samudayasaccaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:203_1: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ atarinti pana padattayena maggasaccaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:203_2: hetugahaṇena ca hetumato gahaṇaṃ siddhamevāti dukkhanirodhasaccāni atthato gahitānevāti ayaṃ saccehi otaraṇā.
tika-s0301t0:203_8: Ye eva pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo,
tika-s0301t0:203_9: te cattāro khandhā dvāyatanāni dve dhātuyoti ayaṃ āyatanamukhena dhātumukhena ca otaraṇā.
tika-s0301t0:203_10: Tathā appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhānāyūhanaggahaṇena kilesābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:203_11: Kilesābhisaṅkhārādayo oghā ca saṅkhārakkhandhā dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātu ca,
tika-s0301t0:203_12: appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanaggahaṇena oghataraṇavacanena ca saha vipassanāya maggo kathito.
tika-s0301t0:203_13: Evañca saṅkhārakkhandho dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātu ca gahitāti evampi khandhamukhena āyatanamukhena dhātumukhena otaraṇā.
tika-s0301t0:203_20: Magge sekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo dhammāyatanadhammadhātū anāsavā ca evampi kho khandhādimukhena otaraṇāti ayaṃ otaraṇo hāro.
tika-s0301t0:204_4: Atarinti pana padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi cāti ayaṃ sodhano hāro.
tika-s0301t0:205_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiādivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ sādhāraṇato paṭikkhepacodanāti
tika-s0301t0:206_3: Saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassanā taṇhāvasena yathārahaṃ tassa hetū.
tika-s0301t0:206_12: Iminā nayena yathārahaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ hetuvibhāgo niddhāretabbo,
tika-s0301t0:206_14: Kilesuppādane hi sammadeva ādīnavadassanaṃ appatiṭṭhānassa hetū,
tika-s0301t0:206_16: vipassanāya ussukkāpanaṃ oghataraṇassa hetūti ayaṃ parikkhāro hāro.
tika-s0301t0:207_1: Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanehi pana sotānaṃ saṃvaro sabbaso pidhānañcāti catubbidhassapi oghassa visesato pidhānaṃ appavattikaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:207_2: Ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya hi kilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanaṃ upacchinnaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:207_3: tassa sabbepi oghā tiṇṇā sammatiṇṇā pahīnā hontīti ayaṃ samāropano hāro.
tika-s0301t0:208_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhāgahaṇena taṇhāvijjā gahitā.
tika-s0301t0:208_1: Tāsaṃ hi vasena satto tattha tattha bhave patiṭṭhāti.
tika-s0301t0:208_5: Tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ samatho ca vipassanā ca paṭipakkhā,
tika-s0301t0:208_6: te “appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ oghamatari”nti padehi pakāsitā honti,
tika-s0301t0:208_9: Tathā hi sā “rāgavirāgā avijjāvirāgā”ti visesetvā vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:208_27: Tathā samathapakkhiyānaṃ saddhindriyānaṃ vipassanāpakkhiyānaṃ aniccasaññādīnañca vasena vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ nandiyāvattassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0301t0:209_0: Tathā vuttanayena gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu taṇhā lobho,
tika-s0301t0:209_2: avijjāya sampayutto lohite sati pubbo viya taṇhāya sati sijjhamāno āghāto doso iti tīhi akusalamūlehi gahitehi,
tika-s0301t0:209_3: tappaṭipakkhato “appatiṭṭha”ntiādivacanehi ca tīṇi akusalamūlāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni ca siddhāni eva honti.
tika-s0301t0:209_4: Idhāpi lobho sabbāni sāsavakusalamūlāni āyūhanadhammā ca samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:209_5: tannibbattā tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānagocarabhūtā ca upādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccantiādinā saccayojanā yojetabbā.
tika-s0301t0:209_12: vimokkhamukhādivasena vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0301t0:210_0: Tathā vuttanayena gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu visesato taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena asubhe “subha”nti,
tika-s0301t0:210_2: avijjādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena “anicce nicca”nti anattani “attā”ti vipallāsā veditabbā.
tika-s0301t0:210_3: Tesaṃ paṭipakkhato “appatiṭṭha”ntiādivacanehi ca laddhehi sativīriyasamādhipaññindriyehi cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni siddhāneva honti.
tika-s0301t0:211_0: Tattha catūhi indriyehi cattāro puggalā niddisitabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0301t0:211_3: Tesu paṭhamo asubhe “subha”nti vipariyesaggāhī satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ sallakkhento bhāvanābalena
tika-s0301t0:211_5: Dutiyo asukhe “sukha”nti vipariyesaggāhī “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā vuttena vīriyasaṃvarabhūtena
tika-s0301t0:211_6: vīriyabalena paṭipakkhaṃ vinodento bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ viddhaṃsetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati.
tika-s0301t0:211_7: Tatiyo anicce “nicca”nti ayāthāvaggāhī samathabalena samāhitacitto saṅkhārānaṃ taṅkhaṇikabhāvaṃ sallakkhento
tika-s0301t0:211_8: bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ samugghātetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati.
tika-s0301t0:211_24: appamaññāsammappadhāniddhipādādivasena vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0301t0:212_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohāranayadvayaṃ siddhameva hoti.
tika-s0301t0:212_2: tesaṃ samānayanaṃ aṅkusoti pañcapi nayā idha niyuttāti veditabbā.
tika-s0301t0:212_3: Idañca suttaṃ soḷasavidhe suttantapaṭṭhāne nibbedhasekkhabhāgiyaṃ byatirekamukhena patiṭṭhānāyūhanāni
tika-s0301t0:212_5: Aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana suttantapaṭṭhāne lokiyalokuttaraṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇañeyyaṃ dassanabhāvanaṃ sakavacanaṃ
tika-s0301t0:215_5: saddena samānattho nipātoti āha “jānāsi noti jānāsi nū”ti.
tika-s0301t0:215_6: Vaṭṭato nimuccanti tena sattāti nimokkho, maggo.
tika-s0301t0:215_14: Dutiyavikappe pana sakalavaṭṭadukkhato sattā nimuccanti ettha pamuccanti viviccanti cāti nimokkho pamokkho viveko,
tika-s0301t0:216_0: Nandīmūlako bhavo nandībhavo purimapade uttarapadalopena “sākabhakkho patthavo sākapatthavo”ti yathā.
tika-s0301t0:216_1: Paṭhamaṃ kammavaṭṭapadhānaṃ atthaṃ vatvā puna kilesakammānaṃ vasena ubhayappadhānaṃ atthaṃ vadanto “nandiyā cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:216_2: Purimanayeti nandīmūlako kammabhavo nandībhavoti etasmiṃ pakkhe.
tika-s0301t0:216_4: Tividhakammābhisaṅkhāravasenāti puññābhisaṅkhārādivasena kāyasaṅkhārādivasena ca tippakārassa kammābhisaṅkhārassa vasena.
tika-s0301t0:216_7: Taṃsampayuttā cāti tena yathāvuttasaṅkhārakkhandhena samaṃ yuttā eva.
tika-s0301t0:217_4: Na hi vedanārahito koci cittuppādo atthi.
tika-s0301t0:217_13: Heṭṭhā dvīhi padehi anupādiṇṇakakkhandhā gahitāti “vedanāna”nti ettha upādiṇṇakaggahaṇaṃ yuttanti āha “upādiṇṇakavedanāna”nti.
tika-s0301t0:217_18: Tesanti tassā vedanāya taṃsampayuttānañca tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:217_19: Vatthārammaṇavasenāti vatthubhūtānaṃ channaṃ ārammaṇabhūtānañca sabbesampi upādiṇṇakarūpadhammānaṃ vasena.
tika-s0301t0:218_0: Kasmā pana heṭṭhā cattāro arūpakkhandhāyeva vuttā,
tika-s0301t0:218_3: Saupādisesanibbānappattiyañhi upādiṇṇakarūpadhammānaṃ viya anupādiṇṇakarūpadhammānaṃ appavattiyeva natthi.
tika-s0301t0:218_4: Dutiyanayeti nandiyā ca bhavassa cāti etamhi pakkhe.
tika-s0301t0:218_10: tañca kho upādiṇṇā anupādiṇṇāti vibhāgaṃ akatvā avisesato.
tika-s0301t0:218_11: Avisesena hi pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appavatti nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:218_15: Imameva ca nayanti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ dutiyameva.
tika-s0301t0:218_20: dutiye pana “amatamahānibbānassā”ti sabbathāpi nibbānasseva vasena bhagavā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi samāpesīti.
tika-s0301t0:221_1: Anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ upasaggavasena atthavisesavācako hotīti āha “upanīyatīti parikkhīyati nirujjhatī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:221_3: Upanīyatīti vā saraseneva jīvitassa maraṇūpagamanaṃ vuttanti āha –
tika-s0301t0:222_0: Idāni kammasādhanavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:222_4: tadeva tesaṃ anupālane ādhipaccasabbhāvato indriyanti āha “jīvitanti jīvitindriya”nti parittanti ittaraṃ.
tika-s0301t0:222_6: Pabandhānupacchedassa paccayabhāvo idha jīvitassa maraṇakiccanti adhippetanti āha “sarasaparittatāya cā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:223_0: Imasmiñhi buddhuppāde ayaṃ kathāti jīvitassa atiittarabhāvadīpanaparā ayaṃ desanā.
tika-s0301t0:223_3: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:223_4: Tattha pavattamānanti nemirathīsā vattantī ekeneva nemippadesena pavattati ekasmiṃ khaṇeti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:223_7: Tasmiṃ citteti tasmiṃ yasmiṃ kismiñci ekasmiṃ citte.
tika-s0301t0:223_9: Niruddhoti vuccatīti matoti vuccati taṃsamaṅgī satto paramatthato.
tika-s0301t0:223_10: Avisesaviduno pana aviññāyamānantarena anusandhānassa niruddhanaṃ nirodhaṃ sallakkhenti.
tika-s0301t0:223_12: Tena tīsupi kālesu sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanaṃ maraṇaṃ cittakkhaṇavasenevāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:224_7: Lahuso vattate khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atiittaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.
tika-s0301t0:225_0: Ye niruddhā marantassāti cavantassa sattassa cutito uddhaṃ niruddhāti vattabbā ye khandhā.
tika-s0301t0:225_1: Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhāti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhamānassa dharantassa bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhā khandhā,
tika-s0301t0:225_2: sabbepi sadisā te sabbepi ekasadisā gatā atthaṅgatā appaṭisandhiyā puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā.
tika-s0301t0:226_0: Anibbattena na jātoti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti “anāgate cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha na jīvati jīvissatī”ti vattabbato.
tika-s0301t0:226_1: Paccuppannena vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamāno nāma hoti,
tika-s0301t0:226_3: Cittabhaṅgā mato lokoti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato
tika-s0301t0:226_4: mato nāma hoti “atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissatī”ti vattabbato,
tika-s0301t0:226_7: yāyaṃ taṃ taṃ pavattaṃ cittaṃ upādāya “tisso jīvati,
tika-s0301t0:227_0: Na santi tāṇāti jaraṃ upagatassa tato taṃnimittaṃ yaṃ vā pāpakārino pāpakammānaṃ upaṭṭhānavasena puññakārino
tika-s0301t0:227_1: piyavippayogavasena cittadukkhaṃ ubhayesampi bandhanacchedanādivasena vitujjamānaṃ anappakaṃ sarīradukkhaṃ
tika-s0301t0:227_4: “tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ bhavituṃ samatthā nāma keci natthī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:227_10: Aparacetananti vasībhāvāpādanavasena parato samāpajjanavasena ca pavattaṃ samāpatticetanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:227_16: Yena te te brahmāno jhānato vuṭṭhāya “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti vācaṃ nicchāresunti.
tika-s0301t0:227_17: Yathā devā sukhabahulā tihetupaṭisandhikāvāti paṭipajjantā jhānaṃ adhigantuṃ bhabbā,
tika-s0301t0:227_19: Kāmāvacarā ca uparidevā ca kāmāvacaradevāti ekadesasarūpekaseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t0:227_20: Tena manussānampi ekaccānaṃ sabbesampi vā saṅgaho siddho hoti patthanāparikappanāya visayabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:227_23: Thullāni phusitāni vipphurāni etthāti thullaphusitako, kālo, deso vā.
tika-s0301t0:228_0: “Puññāni kayirātha sukhāvahānī”ti vuttattā “aniyyānikaṃ vaṭṭakathaṃ kathetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:228_4: Pariyāyeti sabhāvato parivattetvā ñāpeti etenāti pariyāyo, leso,
tika-s0301t0:228_6: vaṭṭassa ekantato bālalokeheva āmasitabbabhāvato pariyāyāmisatā vuttā.
tika-s0301t0:228_10: Ekaccassa sakalavaṭṭāpekkhappahānassapi paccayo hotīti “vaṭṭatiyevā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.
tika-s0301t0:231_2: Purebhattādayo hi kālā dhammappavattimattatāya paramatthato avijjamānāpi lokasaṅketamattasiddhā tassāyeva
tika-s0301t0:231_3: dhammappavattiyā gatagatāya anivattanato taṃ taṃ dhammappavattiṃ khepentā vināsayantā viya sayañca tāhi
tika-s0301t0:231_8: “Etaṃ bhayaṃ maraṇe pekkhamāno”ti vuccamānattā puggalaṃ maraṇūpagamanāya tarayantīti attho vutto.
tika-s0301t0:231_10: Titthiyānaṃ hi carimacittena sakalacitte vayasamūhe vayasamaññāti āha –
tika-s0301t0:231_16: diguṇaṃ diguṇaṃ vaddheyyā”ti ca evamādīsu pana tabbhāvavuttiattho guṇaṭṭho.
tika-s0301t0:234_1: “Vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti ettha attho “accenti kālā”ti ettha vuttanayo eva.
tika-s0301t0:234_2: Paṭhamamajjhimavayāti paṭhamaggahaṇañcettha vayassa gatassa apunarāvattidassanatthaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0301t0:235_0: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ “accenti kālā”ti sāmaññato kālassa apagamanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:235_1: puna taṃ visesatopi dassetuṃ itaradvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:235_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mudindriyassa vasena “vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:235_3: majjhimindriyassa vasena “tarayanti rattiyo”ti vuttanti adhippāyena “kālāti purebhattādayo kālā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:235_7: kālakoṭṭhāso eva aṇupabhedo kālavibhāgo gahitoti veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:235_9: So hi idha atthato adhigatattā anantarasutte ca vuttattā atidisito.
tika-s0301t0:238_6: bhāvento kati uttari bhāveyyāti imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati.
tika-s0301t0:238_9: Yadi evaṃ kimatthaṃ pariyāyantaraṃ gahitanti āha “gāthābandhassa panā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:238_10: Atthato ettha punarutti atthevāti āha “saddapunaruttiṃ vajjayantī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:239_2: Tattha ca kammaṃ tabbipākaṃ satte dukkhaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:239_11: Āropitavacanānurūpeneva evamāhāti “pañca chinde pañca jahe”ti evaṃ kathesi tassā devatāya sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:239_12: Na kevalaṃ tāya devatāya vuttavacanānurūpato eva,
tika-s0301t0:239_13: atha kho tesu saṃyojanesu vattabbākāratopīti dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:239_14: Tena orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma garūni ducchedāni gāḷhabandhanabhāvato,
tika-s0301t0:240_0: Uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pana lahūni succhedāni heṭṭhā pavattitānukkamena bhāvanānayena pahātabbato,
tika-s0301t0:240_3: Visesanti bhāvanānaṃ visesaṃ vipassanābhāvanaṃ bhāvento uppādento vipaccento vaḍḍhento ca.
tika-s0301t0:243_3: “Vissajjanagāthāyaṃ panā”ti imassa padassa “ayamattho veditabbo”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-s0301t0:243_4: Pucchāgāthāya pana attho imināva nayena viññāyatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:243_5: Pañca jāgarataṃ suttāti ettha “suttā”ti padaṃ apekkhitvā pañcāti paccattavacanaṃ “jāgarata”nti padaṃ
tika-s0301t0:243_8: jāgarantesu baddhābhāvena sakiccappasutatāya sakiccasamatthatāya cāti attho.
tika-s0301t0:243_10: Tameva suttabhāvaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya dassetuṃ “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:244_0: Evaṃ gāthāya paṭhamassa pādassa atthaṃ vatvā dutiyassa vattuṃ “evaṃ suttesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:244_2: Yasmā appahīnasupanakiriyāvasena sanīvaraṇassa puggalassa anuppannarāgarajādayo uppajjanti,
tika-s0301t0:244_6: Purimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ aparāparuppattiyā paccayabhāvo hettha ādiyanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:244_7: Pañcahi indriyehi parisujjhatīti maggapariyāpannehi saddhādīhi pañcahi indriyehi sakalasaṃkilesato visujjhati.
tika-s0301t0:247_6: Ito paresanti ito sāsanikehi paresaṃ aññesaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:248_2: Hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbaṃ ñeyyaṃ jānātīti sabbaññū,
tika-s0301t0:248_4: Paccekaṃ parehi asādhāraṇatāya visuṃ sayambhuñāṇena saccāni buddhavāti paccekabuddho.
tika-s0301t0:248_6: Tathā hi so sayambhutāya abhāvato kevalaṃ catusaccabuddhoti vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:248_7: Sutena sutamayañāṇena khandhādibhedaṃ ñeyyaṃ buddhavāti sutabuddho.
tika-s0301t0:248_8: Sabbaññubuddhapaccekabuddhe ṭhapetvā avasesā aggasāvakamahāsāvakāpi pakatisāvakāpi vītarāgā avasesā khīṇāsavā.
tika-s0301t0:248_16: Taṃ visamaṃ pahāya taṃ visamaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā samaṃ sadisaṃ yuttarūpaṃ,
