tika-s0301t0:738_20: anupādiṇṇakadhātūnaṃ pana nānākaraṇaṃ na jānanti eva.
tika-s0301t0:738_22: sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva pana imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattāva imassa rukkhassa khandho seto hoti,
tika-s0301t0:738_28: imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:738_30: phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ ambilaṃ kaṭukaṃ kasāvaṃ;
tika-s0301t0:738_31: kaṇṭako tikhiṇo atikhiṇo ujuko kuṭilo tambo lohito odāto hotīti dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t0:739_1: Nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesūti ajjhattabahiddhābhedato ca saṇṭhānabhedato ca nānappabhedesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu.
tika-s0301t0:739_5: tato eva itthipurisaattaattaniyādivasena anupalabbhesu sabhāvesu. Ma-
tika-s0301t0:739_10: Paṭibhānesūti atthapaṭisambhidādīsu visayabhūtesu “imāni idamatthajotakānī”ti tathā tathā paṭibhānato patiṭṭhānato paṭibhānānīti laddhanāmesu ñāṇesu.
tika-s0301t0:739_11: Puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesūtiādīsu sīlassa puthuttaṃ nānattañca vuttameva.
tika-s0301t0:739_14: tattha upacāravasena puthuttaṃ gahetabbanti āha “puthu janasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkammā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:739_15: Tenassa idha madanimmadanādipariyāyena puthuttaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0301t0:740_0: Evaṃ visayavasena paññāya mahattaṃ puthuttañca dassetvā idāni sampayuttadhammavasena hāsabhāvaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:740_5: Sīlaṃ paripūretīti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā pītisahagatāya paññāya pātimokkhasīlaṃ ṭhapetvā hāsanīyatarasseva
tika-s0301t0:740_6: visuṃ gahitattā itaraṃ tividhaṃ sīlaṃ paripūreti.
tika-s0301t0:740_7: Pītisomanassasahagatā hi paññā abhirativasena tadārammaṇe phullitā vikasitā viya vattati,
tika-s0301t0:741_0: Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccalakkhaṇato khippaṃ javatīti rūpakkhandhaṃ aniccanti sīghavegena pavattiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena
tika-s0301t0:741_1: pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena visaṭṭhavajiraṃ viya lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhantī adandhāyantī rūpakkhandhe
tika-s0301t0:741_5: Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetvā balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:741_12: Vibhāvayitvāti yāthāvato pakāsetvā pañcakkhandhaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā pākaṭaṃ katvā.
tika-s0301t0:741_14: Idāni sikhāppattavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetuṃ puna “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:742_0: Ñāṇatikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhasamucchindane veditabboti “khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapañño”ti
tika-s0301t0:742_1: vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento “uppannaṃ kāmavitakka”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:742_3: paṭipadā cassa na calatīti āha “ekasmiṃ āsane cattāro ca ariyamaggā adhigatā hontī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:742_4: Thero cātiādinā dhammasenāpatino tikkhapaññatā sikhāppattāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:743_0: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā
tika-s0301t0:743_2: na aññathāti kāraṇamukhena nibbedhikapaññaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:743_8: Bahimukho sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho,
tika-s0301t0:744_0: Appicchoti santaguṇaniguhanatāti attani vijjamānānaṃ bāhusaccadhutadhammasīlādiguṇānañceva paṭivedhaguṇassa ca niguhanaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:744_1: paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutāti eteneva pariyesanaparibhogamattaññutāpi vuttā hoti.
tika-s0301t0:744_2: Tīhi santosehīti catūsu paccayesu paccekaṃ tīhi santosehi,
tika-s0301t0:744_7: Paramavodānappattānaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattisamadhigamena ativiya vodānaṃ visuddhiṃ pattānaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:744_11: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ lābhī pavivitto “pakārehi vivitto”ti katvā.
tika-s0301t0:745_0: Āraddhavīriyoti ettha vīriyārambho nāma vīriyassa paggaṇhanaṃ paripuṇṇakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:745_1: Taṃ pana sabbaso kilesānaṃ niggaṇhananti dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:745_2: Odhunanavattāti kilesānaṃ yassa kassaci sāvajjassa odhunanavasena vattā.
tika-s0301t0:745_8: Pāpe lāmake puggale dhamme ca garahati jigucchatīti pāpagarahī.
tika-s0301t0:745_13: parito me katthaci mā ahūti yojanā.
tika-s0301t0:746_2: Ayaṃ dhammasenāpatino guṇakathā satthu vacanānusārena dasasahassacakkavāḷabyāpinī ahosi,
tika-s0301t0:746_10: Rattakambalassa vasena sabhāvavaṇṇasiddhiyā veḷuriyamaṇi ativiya sobhatīti āha “paṇḍukambale nikkhitto”ti.
tika-s0301t0:746_12: Tañca appakena suvaṇṇena kataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ na sobhati sobhāvipulenāti āha “atirekapañcasuvaṇṇena katapiḷandhana”nti.
tika-s0301t0:746_19: sampahaṭṭhanti suṭṭhu kusalena suvaṇṇakārena ukkāya tāpetvā sammā pahaṭṭhaṃ majjanādivasena sukataparikammaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:747_2: Neva maraṇaṃ abhinandatīti attanopi maraṇaṃ neva abhinandati attavinipātassa sāvajjabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:747_3: Bodhisatto pana paresaṃ atthāya attano attabhāvaṃ pariccajati karuṇāvasena,
tika-s0301t0:747_4: evaṃ vosajjanaṃ paramatthapāramīpāripūriṃ gacchatīti sāvakā na tathā kātuṃ sakkā sikkhāpadato.
tika-s0301t0:747_6: Divasasaṅkhepanti ajja tvaṃ idaṃ nāma kammaṃ karohi,
tika-s0301t0:747_7: idaṃ te vetananti divasabhāgena paricchinnaṃ vetanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:747_10: Nibbisaṃ bhatako yathāti vetanaṃ bhatiṃ icchanto kālakkhayaṃ udikkhanto bhatakapuriso viya.
tika-s0301t0:750_4: Na pāpaṃ samanupassatīti kiñci pāpaṃ atthīti na passati,
tika-s0301t0:750_7: “Katakammānampi vipāko natthī”ti vadanto katapāpānaṃ akatapuññānañca vissatthataṃ nirāsaṅkataṃ janeti.
tika-s0301t0:751_2: Tasmiñhi samādāne ṭhitena saṃvarena saṃvutacitto samannāgato pihito ca nāma hotīti “susaṃvutatto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:751_7: So panettha bhāgo saṃvaralakkhaṇoti āha “cātuyāmena susaṃvuto”ti,
tika-s0301t0:751_10: Sabbena pāpavāraṇena yuttoti sabbappakārena saṃvaralakkhaṇena pāpavāraṇena samannāgato.
tika-s0301t0:751_12: Phuṭṭhoti aṭṭhannampi kammānaṃ khepanena vikkhepappattiyā kammakkhayalakkhaṇena sabbena pāpavāraṇena phuṭṭho,
tika-s0301t0:751_14: Na niguhantoti na niguhanahetu diṭṭhasute tatheva kathento.
tika-s0301t0:752_0: Nānātitthiyānaṃyeva upaṭṭhākoti paravādīnaṃ sabbesaṃyeva titthiyānaṃ upaṭṭhāko,
tika-s0301t0:753_1: Sīhena sīhanādaṃ nadantena saheva siṅgālena attano siṅgālaravakaraṇamattena.
tika-s0301t0:753_3: Āsaṅkitasamācāroti attanā ca parehi ca āsaṅkitabbasamācāro.
tika-s0301t0:754_1: Sarīre anuāvisīti sarīre anupavisitvā viya āvisi.
tika-s0301t0:754_2: Adhimuccīti yathā gahitassa vasena cittaṃ na vattati,
tika-s0301t0:763_1: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti bhagavato guṇe ajānanto kosalarājā attano khattiyamānena kevalaṃ bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
tika-s0301t0:763_2: Paṭhamāgate hi satthari tassa sammoditākāraṃ dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:763_3: Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchantoti yathā bhagavā “kacci te, mahārāja,
tika-s0301t0:763_5: kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā tena raññā saddhiṃ paṭhamaṃ pavattamodo ahosi pubbabhāsitāya,
tika-s0301t0:763_6: tadanukaraṇena evaṃ sopi rājā bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosīti yojanā.
tika-s0301t0:763_7: Taṃ pana samappavattamodanaṃ upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:763_8: Tattha sammoditanti saṃsanditaṃ ekībhāvanti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ ekarūpataṃ,
tika-s0301t0:763_9: khamanīyanti “idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:763_11: Yāpanīyanti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ cirapabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:763_16: Sukhavihārasambhavena kacci phāsuvihāro atthīti tattha tattha kacci-
tika-s0301t0:763_21: Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti imaṃ pana atthaṃ dassento “sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:764_6: Guṇāguṇavasenāti guṇavasena gambhīrabhāvaṃ vā aguṇavasena uttānabhāvaṃ vā.
tika-s0301t0:764_9: Satthu sammāsambuddhataṃ pucchanto hi “kiṃ bhavaṃ gotamo sabbalokato nissaṭo,
tika-s0301t0:764_12: Yathā hi satthu sammāsambuddhatāya lokato nissaṭatā viññāyati,
tika-s0301t0:765_0: Rājā satthu aviparītadhammadesanaṃ ajānanto tato evassa sammāsambodhiṃ asaddahanto “vuḍḍhataresupi cirapabbajitesu
tika-s0301t0:765_1: sammāsambuddhabhāve alabbhamāne tabbiparīte kathaṃ labbheyyā”ti maññamāno “kiṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo”tiādiṃ vakkhati.
tika-s0301t0:765_2: Rājā attano laddhiyā na pucchati attano sammukhā tehi asammāsambuddhabhāvasseva paṭiññātattā.
tika-s0301t0:765_3: Yasmā te musāvāditāya attano upaṭṭhākādīnaṃ “buddhā maya”nti paṭijāniṃsu,
tika-s0301t0:765_8: sambodhiñāṇe pana gahite taṃ atthato gahitameva hotīti vuttaṃ “sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sammāsambodhi”nti.
tika-s0301t0:766_0: Pabbajjūpagamanenāti yāya kāyaci pabbajjāya upagamanamattena samaṇā,
tika-s0301t0:766_6: Etesaṃ atthīti etesaṃ sabbaññupaṭiññātānaṃ parivārabhūto atthi.
tika-s0301t0:766_10: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ gaṇe eva loke saṅghasaddassa niruḷhattā.
tika-s0301t0:766_14: “Appicchā”ti vatvā tattha labbhamānaṃ appicchataṃ dassetuṃ “apicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:766_15: Na hi tesu sāsanikesu viya santaguṇaniguhanā appicchā labbhatīti.
tika-s0301t0:766_17: Taranti etena saṃsāroghanti evaṃ sammatattā titthaṃ vuccati laddhīti āha “titthakarāti laddhikarā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:768_1: Idaṃ gahetvāti idaṃ parammukhā “mayaṃ buddhā”ti vatvā attano sammukhā “na mayaṃ buddhā”ti tehi vuttavacanaṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0301t0:768_5: Attano paṭiññaṃ gahetvāti “na mayaṃ buddhā”ti tesaṃ attano purato pavattitaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0301t0:769_7: Idha pana yasmā “bhavampi no gotamo”tiādinā bhagavantaṃ uddissa kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi,
tika-s0301t0:769_10: saṃsayuppattidīpakaṃ noti vuttaggahaṇaṃ pana taṃ paricchijjatīti.
tika-s0301t0:769_12: Idāni avaññāparibhave payogato vibhāvetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:769_14: vambhanavasena paribhavassāti adhippāyena kāyapayogavasena avaññā dassitā,
tika-s0301t0:769_19: Catūsupi taṃ na kātabbameva sampati āyatiñca anatthāvahattā.
tika-s0301t0:770_0: Tadatthadīpanāti tassa ādito vuttassa atthassa dīpanā.
tika-s0301t0:770_2: Khettānaṃ adhipatīti khattiyoti niruttinayena saddasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0301t0:770_3: Khettato vivādā satte tāyatīti khattiyoti lokiyā kathayanti.
tika-s0301t0:770_7: Sā hi udayabbayābhāvato “na kadāci kharatīti akkhara”nti vuttā.
tika-s0301t0:771_0: Kevalaṃ nāmapadaṃ vuttaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ apekkhatevāti āha “ṭhānaṃ hīti kāraṇaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:771_3: Taṃ khattiyaṃ parivajjeyyāti khattiyaṃ avaññāparibhavakaraṇato vajjeyya.
tika-s0301t0:772_0: Uragassa ca nānāvidhavaṇṇaggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vadati “yena yena hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0301t0:772_6: Yāvabrahmalokappamāṇoti kappavuṭṭhānakāle araññe agginā gahite kālantare eva kaṭṭhatiṇarukkhādisambhavoti
tika-s0301t0:772_7: dassetuṃ “jāyanti tattha pārohā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:773_3: kāraṃ “vindare”ti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbanti āha “na vindantī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:773_5: sayaṃ pana sabbaso saha dhanena vinassantīti attho.
tika-s0301t0:774_0: “Sammadeva samācare”ti ettha yathā rājādīsu sammā samācareyya,
tika-s0301t0:774_7: cattāro arūpībrahmaloketi evaṃ nava brahmaloke kammabhavavibhāgena,
tika-s0301t0:775_1: Sā panassā kantatā ativiya iṭṭhatāya manavaḍḍhanatāya sobhanatāyāti āha “atiiṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ atisundaranti attho”ti.
tika-s0301t0:775_3: vacanaṃ pana bhagavato dhammadesanāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:776_3: Hatthe gahetvāti “puratthābhimukho uttarābhimukho vā gacchā”tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā nissandehaṃ
tika-s0301t0:776_6: Nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyyāti ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ tassa ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya.
tika-s0301t0:776_8: tato eva adhomukhabhāvena asaddhamme patitanti evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:776_17: Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggo.
tika-s0301t0:776_18: Teneva hi tadubhayapaṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya “saggamokkhamaggaṃ āvikarontenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:777_2: Ajjatāti ajjāti padassa vaḍḍhanamattaṃ hettha tā-
tika-s0301t0:777_4: Pāṇehi upetanti pāṇehi saha saraṇaṃ upetaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:777_6: tāva saraṇaṃ gatameva maṃ dhāretū”ti āpāṇakoṭikaṃ attano saraṇagamanaṃ pavedeti.
tika-s0301t0:780_2: Tattha hi upasaṅkamantavelāya satthu guṇe ajānanto kevalaṃ sammodanaṃ karoti.
tika-s0301t0:780_3: Desanaṃ sutvā pana satthu guṇe ñatvā saraṇaṅgatattā idha imasmiṃ samāgame abhivādesi pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi.
tika-s0301t0:780_5: avijahena attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattadhammā ajjhattaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇavasena,
tika-s0301t0:780_18: Tato eva yathā saggamaggesu na dissati,
tika-s0301t0:783_2: Jarāmaraṇavirahito jāto nāma atthi nu khoti pucchati.
tika-s0301t0:783_6: kāraṃ katvā “mahāsālā”ti vuttanti dasseti yathā “puratthiyoti pulatthiyo”ti.
tika-s0301t0:784_1: Ārakāti ca sabbaso samucchinnattā tehi dūreti attho.
tika-s0301t0:784_6: abhidhammanayo eva pana nippariyāyoti āha “cattāro āsavā”ti brahmacariyavāsanti maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:784_8: Catūhi maggehi karaṇīyanti paccekaṃ catūhi maggehi kattabbaṃ pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanābhisamayaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:784_12: Attapaṭibaddhatāya attano avijahanato paramatthadesanāya ca paramattho arahattaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:784_16: Orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyavibhāgaṃ dasavidhampi bhavesu saṃyojanaṃ kilesakammavipākavaṭṭapaccayo hutvā nissarituṃ
tika-s0301t0:784_18: Satipi hi aññesaṃ tappakkhiyabhāvena vinā saṃyojanāni tesaṃ tappaccayabhāvo atthi,
tika-s0301t0:784_20: na ca upacchinnasaṃyojanassa katānipi kammāni bhavaṃ nibbattentīti tesaṃyeva saṃyojanaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t0:784_21: Sammā kāraṇehi jānitvāti ñāyena dukkhādīsu so yathā jānitabbo;
tika-s0301t0:784_23: pubbakālakiriyāvimuttā hi aparakālakiriyā ca yathā sambhavati,
tika-s0301t0:785_4: taṃ tassa santānagatavippayuttanti katvā vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha “khīṇāsavassa hi ajīraṇadhammopi atthī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:785_5: Tenāha bhagavā “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañcā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:785_7: “jīraṇadhamma”nti yathāvuttaṃ ajīraṇadhammaṃ ṭhapetvā jīraṇadhammaṃ dassento “tesaṃpāyaṃ kāyo bhedanadhammo”ti evamāha.
tika-s0301t0:785_8: Jaraṃ pattasseva hissa bhedananikkhipitabbatāniyate atthe suttadesanā pavattā.
tika-s0301t0:786_2: Na hi kadāci sādhūnaṃ sādhūhi saha kattabbā honti,
tika-s0301t0:786_3: tasmā sīdanasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ bhijjanappattattā nibbānaṃ sabbhīti vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:786_4: Purimapadassāti “satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upetī”ti padassa.
tika-s0301t0:786_6: Sataṃ dhammo nibbānaṃ kilesehi saṃsīdanabhijjanasabhāvo na hoti,
tika-s0301t0:786_7: tasmā taṃ āgamma jaraṃ na upeti.
tika-s0301t0:786_14: na tena dhammena samatthi kiñcī”ti ca.
tika-s0301t0:789_2: Nilīnassa teneva janavivekena ekamantaṃ nisajjāya ekībhāvena paṭisallīnassa viya.
tika-s0301t0:789_4: Sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karonto āha tassa vacanaṃ “evameta”nti sampaṭicchitvā tassa vacanaṃ tathāpaccanubhāsanto.
tika-s0301t0:789_5: Antakenādhipannattā eva khettavatthuhiraññasuvaṇṇādi mānusaṃ bhavaṃ jahato.
tika-s0301t0:792_2: Kammapathabhedaṃ appattassāti supinakālo viya pavattimattatāya kammapathavisesaṃ agatassa.
tika-s0301t0:792_5: itarassa pana saṃvarabhāvo purimehi tīhi padehi dassitovāti.
tika-s0301t0:795_1: Uḷārasaddo seṭṭhe bahuke ca dissatīti āha “paṇīte ca bahuke cā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:798_2: tasmā kāmā tassa patiṭṭhā paccayo kāraṇanti āha “kāmahetū”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:801_2: Pucchākāraṇaṃ codetvā samudayato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “ayaṃ kira mallikā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:801_3: Mālārāmaṃ gantvāti attano pitu mālārāmaṃ rakkhaṇatthañceva avasesapupphaggahaṇatthañca gantvā.
tika-s0301t0:801_5: So kira gāmo mahākosalarājena attano dhītuyā patigharaṃ gacchantiyā pupphamūlatthāya dinno,
tika-s0301t0:801_10: Nivattitunti tassā dhammatāya nivattituṃ tassā vacanaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ.
tika-s0301t0:804_7: na nu kho labhissāmī”ti nicchayaṃ avindanto na ñāyanto.
tika-s0301t0:804_8: Pheṇuddehakanti yathā yattha kuthite pheṇaṃ uddehati na upadhīyati,
tika-s0301t0:804_10: Taṃ divasanti tasmiṃ raññā niddaṃ alabhitvā dukkhaseyyadivase.
tika-s0301t0:804_11: Ālokaṃ oloketvāti lohakumbhimukhavaṭṭisīse patte tattha mahantaṃ ālokaṃ oloketvā.
tika-s0301t0:804_15: vattuñca pana avisahanto “sa” iti vatvā lohakumbhiyaṃ nimuggo.
tika-s0301t0:804_16: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmo ahosīti ayaṃ panettha sambandho.
tika-s0301t0:804_18: Dhammabheriṃ carāpesuṃ “koci kañci pāṇaṃ mā hanatū”ti.
tika-s0301t0:804_19: So itthisāmiko puriso sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi attano upanissayasampattiyā sattu ca desanāvilāsasampattiyā,
tika-s0301t0:804_20: rājā pana mahābodhinirujjhanasabhāvattā kiñci visesaṃ nādhigacchi.
tika-s0301t0:805_1: Nipphannasassato navabhāge kassakassa datvā raññaṃ ekabhāgaggahaṇaṃ dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:805_2: Evaṃ kassakā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sassāni sampādentīti āha “sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho”ti.
tika-s0301t0:805_9: Idañhi raṭṭhaṃ acoriyaṃ niraggaḷanti vuccati apārutagharabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:806_1: Dvīhi pariyaññehīti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi parivārayaññehi.
tika-s0301t0:806_3: nassāti sattavīsādhikānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pasusatānaṃ dvāvīsatiyā assādīhi ca saṭṭhiadhikadvisataāraññakapasūhi
tika-s0301t0:806_4: ca saddhiṃ sampiṇḍitānaṃ pana navādhikachasatapasūnaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa.
tika-s0301t0:809_3: Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinadītīre pathaviyā vivare dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi.
tika-s0301t0:809_4: Andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā “ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo”ti saññāya tattha sammāpāsayaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti.
tika-s0301t0:809_11: Tattha kira yaññe attano sāpateyyaṃ anavasesato anigūhitvā niyyātīyati.
tika-s0301t0:809_13: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vividhā yattha haññare”ti vakkhamānattā “mahākiccā”ti attho vutto,
tika-s0301t0:809_14: idha “mahārambhāti papañcavasena ajeḷakā”tiādi vuttanti “bahupasughātakammā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0301t0:812_7: Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “rañño kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:813_5: Attheti atthe kicce jāte thiranti na kathenti kāyabalamattena apanetuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0301t0:813_6: Suṭṭhu rattarattāti ativiya rattā eva hutvā rattā.
tika-s0301t0:813_8: Ohārinanti heṭṭhā haraṇasīlanti āha “catūsu apāyesu ākaḍḍhanaka”nti.
tika-s0301t0:818_1: Pubbārāmasaṅkhāteti sāvatthinagarassa pubbadisāya katattā pubbārāmeti saṅkhaṃ gate.
tika-s0301t0:818_3: Ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā anupubbikathā ādito paṭṭhāya anukkamakathā.
tika-s0301t0:818_4: Patthanaṃ akāsi tassa bhagavato aggupaṭṭhāyikaṃ ekaṃ upāsikaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhantī.
tika-s0301t0:818_6: Mātiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi tassā upakāraṃ garubhāvañca disvā.
tika-s0301t0:818_7: Tāya kārite pāsādeti tāya mahāupāsikāya mahālatāpasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navahi koṭīhi karīsamatte bhūmibhāge kārite sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍite pāsāde.
tika-s0301t0:819_6: Attanā diṭṭhasutaṃ paṭicchādetvā na katheyyunti akāraṇametaṃ tesaṃ raññā payuttacarapurisabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:819_7: Evaṃ kate pana te “aññepi pabbajitā atthīti ayaṃ jānātī”ti maññeyyunti kohaññacitto evaṃ akāsīti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:820_1: Taṃ kira vaṇṇavasena samujjalaṃ hoti pabhassaraṃ,
tika-s0301t0:820_6: “Gihinā”tiādīhi padehi evaṃ pamādavihārinā tayā arahanto duviññeyyāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:821_0: Saṃvāso nāma idha kālena upasaṅkamananti dassento “upasaṅkamantenā”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:821_5: Jānituṃ na sakkoti sabhāvassa sato sīlassa anupadhāraṇato.
tika-s0301t0:822_3: Tassa pana kāraṇameva gaṇhanto “ettha cetanā”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:822_6: Paññattivohāro tathā tathā voharitabbato evamāha “saṃvohārena kho, mahārāja,
tika-s0301t0:824_0: Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānenāti vaṇṇena vā saṇṭhānena vā vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā saṇṭhānasampattiyā vā.
tika-s0301t0:827_2: Te pana nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnāpi rūpāyatanattā cakkhuviññeyyataṃ nātivattantīti āha “nīlapītādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇa”nti. To-
tika-s0301t0:827_4: saddo viya kālattho hotīti āha “yatoti yadā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:827_8: tassa aggabhāvena pariyantaṃ paramaṃ koṭiṃ katvā pavattitanti attho.
tika-s0301t0:827_9: Puggalamanāpanti ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ acintetvā puggalassa vasena manāpabhāveneva iṭṭhatāya iṭṭhanti.
tika-s0301t0:827_11: Puggalamanāpaṃ nāma saññāvipallāsavasena viparītampi gaṇhāti itarasabhāvatoti āha “yaṃ ekassa…pe…
tika-s0301t0:827_14: Idaṃ puggalamanāpanti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ jivhāviññeyyaṃ viya aññampi evaṃjātikaṃ tena tena puggalena manāpanti gahetabbārammaṇaṃ puggalamanāpaṃ nāma.
tika-s0301t0:828_1: vibhajitvā dassanena lokena madhurajātenapi paṭivibhattaṃ katvā gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:828_7: Tatthapi iṭṭhāniṭṭhaparicchedo nippariyāyato evaṃ veditabboti dassento āha “tañca paneta”ntiādi.
tika-s0301t0:828_8: Tañca panetaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacarajavanesu akusalassa vasena yebhuyyena pavattatīti
tika-s0301t0:828_9: katvā tattha “rajjati dussatī”ti akusalasseva pavatti dassitā.
tika-s0301t0:828_17: tasmā tattha uppajjamānaṃ vipākacittaṃ yathāsabhāvato pavattatīti.
tika-s0301t0:829_0: Yaṃ pana sammohavinodaniyaṃ “kusalakammajaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:829_2: Tena sobhanaṃ akusalakammajampi ekaccānaṃ sattānaṃ iṭṭhanti anuññātaṃ siyā.
tika-s0301t0:829_6: Manussā ca devatānaṃ rūpaṃ disvā bhāyanti,
tika-s0301t0:829_7: tesampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha kusalavipākameva uppajjati,
tika-s0301t0:829_8: tādisassa pana puññassa abhāvā na tesaṃ tattha abhirati hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:829_9: Kusalakammajassa pana aniṭṭhassa abhāvo viya akusalakammajassa sobhanassa iṭṭhassa abhāvo vattabbo.
tika-s0301t0:829_10: Hatthiādīnampi hi akusalakammajaṃ manussānaṃ akusalavipākasseva ārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:829_12: iṭṭhārammaṇena vomissakattā appakaṃ akusalakammajaṃ bahulaṃ akusalavipākuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ na bhavissatīti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:829_13: Idāni tameva vipākavasena iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇavavatthānaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kiñcāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:829_15: idha pana na tathā vibhattanti āha “bhagavā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:830_3: Te rājāno hatappabhe hatasobhe disvāti sambandho.
tika-s0301t0:834_1: “Doṇapākakura”nti ettha vibhattilopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha “doṇapākaṃ kura”nti.
tika-s0301t0:834_9: Assa rañño ubhosu passesu gahitatālavaṇṭā bījanti yamakatālavaṇṭehi.
tika-s0301t0:835_6: Atha vā saṇikaṃ jīratīti so bhojane mattaññū puggalo parimitāhāratāya saṇikaṃ cirena jīrati jaraṃ pāpuṇāti jīvitaṃ pālento.
tika-s0301t0:836_0: Pariyāpuṇitvāti ettha yathā sabbaṃ so pariyāpuṇi,
tika-s0301t0:836_3: Tāvatake taṇḍule hāreyyāsi tadupiyañca byañjananti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0301t0:837_0: Purisabhāgo esāti majjhimena purisena bhuñjitabbabhāgo eso,
tika-s0301t0:837_2: Sallikhitasarīratāti bhamaṃ āropetvā ullikhitassa viya sabbapariḷāhavūpasamassa puthulatāpagatasarīrassa.
tika-s0301t0:837_5: Sīlaṅgaṃ nāma hotīti catupārisuddhisīlassa avayavo eko bhāgo hoti.
tika-s0301t0:841_6: tathā hi “ajja imaṃ rattiṃ dukkhaṃ setī”ti kālaparicchedavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:841_7: Verighāto nāma veripuggale satīti āha “veripuggalaṃ labhatī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:844_7: Vilumpīyatīti viluttaparasantakassa asakattā puggalo diṭṭhadhammikaṃ kammaphalaṃ paṭisaṃvedento viya sayampi parena vilumpīyati,
tika-s0301t0:844_9: “Kāraṇa”nti hi maññatīti pāpakiriyaṃ attano hitāvahaṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā maññati.
tika-s0301t0:844_10: Jayanto puggalo “idaṃ nāma jināmī”ti maññamāno sayampi tato parājayaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0301t0:844_13: paccayalābhena laddhāvasarena vivaṭṭetvā vigamitena kammenāti attho.
tika-s0301t0:847_4: Disājeṭṭhakāti catūsupi disāsu jeṭṭhakasīsena hi lokaṃ vadati.
tika-s0301t0:851_1: Appamādassa pāsaṃsabhāve ekantato kattabbatāya pana “etānī”tiādinā kāraṇaṃ āha.
tika-s0301t0:851_4: yasmā ca puññakiriyāsu appamatto ubho atthe adhiggaṇhāti,
tika-s0301t0:851_6: Dutiyayojanāya pana paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti. Kattha?
tika-s0301t0:854_1: Sīlādiguṇasamannāgato kalyāṇo bhaddako mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto,
tika-s0301t0:854_2: tassa dhammo kalyāṇamittasseva svākhāto nāma hoti sutvā kattabbakiccassa sādhanato.
tika-s0301t0:854_6: Etanti “so ca kho kalyāṇamittassā”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:854_12: Na hi sesabodhisattānaṃ paropadesena payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-s0301t0:855_0: Upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittatoti brahmacariyaṃ carantassa upaḍḍhaguṇo kalyāṇamittato laddhabbo.
tika-s0301t0:855_1: Upaḍḍhaṃ paccattapurisakāratoti itaraṃ upaḍḍhaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭipajjantassa attano purisakārato.
tika-s0301t0:855_9: Vinibbhogo vivecanaṃ natthi ekajjhaṃ atthassa vivecetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0301t0:855_15: Asakkuṇeyye sakalampi na sambhavati paratoghosamattena tesaṃ asijjhanato,
tika-s0301t0:855_17: Pubbabhāgapaṭilābhaṅganti pubbabhāge paṭiladdhabbakāraṇaṃ kalyāṇamittassa upadesena vinā tena uttari visesato aladdhabbato.
tika-s0301t0:855_21: Te pana sīlādayo saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannāti āha “saṅkhārakkhandhotipi vadantiyevā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:856_4: “Māhevaṃ ānandā”ti vadato bhagavato imasmiṃ ṭhāne tādisassa nāma te, ānanda,
tika-s0301t0:856_5: kalyāṇamittaguṇe sevato vattuṃ yuttaṃ ayāthāvatoti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa yathābhūtaguṇakittanamukhena
tika-s0301t0:856_7: Idanti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āhāti sambandho.
tika-s0301t0:857_4: Ādipadānaṃyevāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vākye ādito eva vuttasammādiṭṭhiādipadānaṃyeva.
tika-s0301t0:857_5: Sammādassanalakkhaṇāti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena sammadeva dassanasabhāvā.
tika-s0301t0:857_6: Sammāabhiropanalakkhaṇoti nibbānasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe sampayuttadhamme sammadeva āropanasabhāvo.
tika-s0301t0:857_7: Sammāpariggahaṇalakkhaṇāti musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato
tika-s0301t0:857_8: pariggāhakasabhāvā sammāvācā siniddhabhāvena sampayuttadhamme sammāvācāpaccayaṃ subhāsitasotārañca puggalaṃ
tika-s0301t0:857_12: tathā sammākammanta saṅkhātā viratipīti samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-s0301t0:857_13: sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhāpanaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
tika-s0301t0:857_17: Yathā uppannuppannānaṃ vajjānaṃ dhammena pahānānuppādaatthalābhādiparivuḍḍhi hoti,
tika-s0301t0:857_19: Kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccaattagāhānañca vidhamanavasena sammāpatiṭṭhānasabhāvāti sammāupaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā sammāsati.
tika-s0301t0:857_20: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ sammā samādahanaṃ ekaggatākaraṇaṃ sabhāvo etassāti sammāsamādhānalakkhaṇo sammāsamādhi.
tika-s0301t0:857_25: Saddhinti iminā “aññehī”ti vuttakilesā micchādiṭṭhiyā saha ekaṭṭhā vā anekaṭṭhā vāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:857_27: Nirodhanti nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati.
tika-s0301t0:858_1: atha kho aparenapi nayena veditabbāti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:858_7: Tīṇi nāmāni labhati kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ pahānavasena pavattiyā.
tika-s0301t0:858_10: Viratiyopi honti cetanāyopi pubbabhāgepi vikkhambhanavasena pavattanato.
tika-s0301t0:858_15: Pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepīti yathā pubbabhāge paṭhamajjhānādivasena nānā.
tika-s0301t0:858_17: Na hi ekopi ca maggasamādhi paṭhamajjhānasamādhiādināmāni labhati sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ viya kiccavasena bhedābhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:859_1: Vuddhi nāma vepullaṃ bhiyyobhāvo punappunaṃ uppādo evāti āha “punappunaṃ janetī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:859_7: Tesu purimo vivecanīyato viviccamānatāya viviccanakiriyāya samaṅgī dhammasamūho tāya eva viviccanakiriyāya vasena vivekoti gahito.
tika-s0301t0:859_10: taṃ yathāvuttāya viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātaṃ nissāyeva pavattati,
tika-s0301t0:860_0: Yathā vā vivekavasena pavattaṃ jhānaṃ “vivekaja”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:860_2: Nissayo ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:860_3: Asatipi tāsaṃ pubbāparabhāve “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ettha paccayānaṃ samuppādanaṃ viya abhinnadhammādhārā nissayabhāvanā sambhavanti.
tika-s0301t0:860_5: samucchedanissaraṇavivekanissitataṃ vatvā paṭippassaddhivivekanissitatāya avacanaṃ ariyamaggabhāvanāya vuccamānattā.
tika-s0301t0:860_11: disvā tappaṭipakkhe nibbāne ninnatāya ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissito hoti,
tika-s0301t0:860_17: tadaggena phalaninnatāpi siyā “kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja vihareyya”nti ajjhāsayasampattiyā bhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:860_18: Yasmā pahānavinayo viya rāganirodhopi idhādhippetavivekena atthato nibbisiṭṭho,
tika-s0301t0:861_0: Vossaggasaddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā.
tika-s0301t0:861_8: Ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhīti ayaṃ missakavasena vuttā sammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0301t0:862_0: Pubbe vossaggavacanasseva atthassa vuttattā āha “sakalena vacanenā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:862_3: Pariṇāmo nāma idha paripākoti āha “paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:862_4: Paripāko ca āsevanalābhena laddhasāmatthiyassa kilese pariccajituṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandituṃ tikkhavisadabhāvo.
tika-s0301t0:862_6: Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ nayo “vivekanissita”ntiādinā sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ vutto,
tika-s0301t0:862_13: Na koci maggo sāvaseso hutvā sambhavati.
tika-s0301t0:862_14: Heṭṭhime magge uppanne uparimo uppanno eva nāma anantarāyena uppajjanato.
tika-s0301t0:865_3: tasmā visesanabhāvena vuccamāno divasaddo atthavisesaṃ dīpetīti āha “divasassa divā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:865_8: Tassa gehe katākatabhaṇḍassa atibahubhāvato vimhayappatto rājā “ko pana vādo”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:865_11: Sakuṇḍakabhattanti sakuṇḍehi vā sathusehi vā pakkabhattaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:866_1: Kammassa nibbattabhāvena otaraṇatāya phalaṃ aggaṃ nāma,
tika-s0301t0:867_1: So yena bhāvena yattha pākaṭataro hutvā dissati,
tika-s0301t0:867_4: Taṃ apeyyamānanti taṃ udakaṃ kenaci aparibhuñjiyamānaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:867_6: paribhogavasena ceva saṅgahetabbasaṅgaṇhanavasena ca niyojakoti attho.
tika-s0301t0:870_2: Paṭipādanaṃ tena saha yojananti āha “piṇḍapātena saddhiṃ saṃyojesi,
tika-s0301t0:870_6: Taṃ taṃ pavattitaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:870_7: Idāni “imassa seṭṭhissa kassaci samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā dethā”ti vacanaṃ na sutapubbaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:870_8: yasmā paccekabuddhā nāma attano guṇānubhāvehi loke pākaṭā sañjātā eva honti,
tika-s0301t0:870_9: tasmā seṭṭhibhariyāya “na yassa vā tassa vā”tiādi cintitaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:870_10: Tathā hi tesaṃ dentāpi sakkaccaṃ yebhuyyena paṇītameva denti.
tika-s0301t0:870_12: So luddhatāya “bahu vata dhaññaṃ mamassā”ti cittaṃ saṃyametuṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto.
tika-s0301t0:871_1: “Imassa samaṇassa piṇḍapātaṃ dehī”ti vadato na ekāya eva javanavīthiyā vasena atthasiddhi.
tika-s0301t0:871_2: Atha kho tattha ādito pavattajavanavāropi atthi majjhe pavattajavanavāropi,
tika-s0301t0:871_4: Ekā cetanā dve paṭisandhiyo na detīti ettha sāketapañhavasena nicchayo veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:871_5: Cuddasannaṃ cetanānaṃ pubbe puretaraṃ katattā purāṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:877_2: tena tamena yuttoti tamo puggalo vuccati,
tika-s0301t0:877_4: Tasmā tamoti appakāsanabhāvena tamo tamabhūto andhakāro viya jāto,
tika-s0301t0:877_6: Vuttalakkhaṇaṃ tamameva paramparato ayanaṃ gati niṭṭhā etassāti tamaparāyaṇo,
tika-s0301t0:877_12: tena jotinā yuttotiādi sabbaṃ tame vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:877_13: Itare dveti jotitamaparāyaṇo jotijotiparāyaṇoti itare dve puggale.
tika-s0301t0:878_3: Rathesu cammena hananakaraṇato rathakārā cammakārā vuttā.
tika-s0301t0:878_11: Laku viya ghaṭikā viya ḍeti pavattatīti hi lakuṇḍako, rasso.
tika-s0301t0:878_13: Taṃ panassa nimīlanaṃ ekena akkhinā dvīhipi vāti āha “ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:878_18: Heṭṭhimakāyasaṅkhāto sarīrassa pakkho padeso hato assāti pakkhahato.
tika-s0301t0:879_0: Āgamanavipattīti āgamanaṭṭhānavasena vipatti āgamo etthāti katvā.
tika-s0301t0:879_7: Tādise nihīnakule uppannopi koci vibhavasampanno siyā,
tika-s0301t0:879_10: Sukhena hi jīvikaṃ pavattetuṃ upāyabhūtā hatthisippādayo imassa natthi,
tika-s0301t0:880_0: Dasahi akkosavatthūhīti lakkhaṇavacanaṃ etaṃ yathā “yadi me byādhitā honti,
tika-s0301t0:880_3: tattha vā yena kenaci paribhāsatīti attho.
tika-s0301t0:883_6: Cirakālaṃ atikkantāti dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe vītivattā. Vayo-
tika-s0301t0:883_7: saddo sādhāraṇavacanopi jiṇṇasaddasannidhānato osānavayaṃ eva vadatīti āha “pacchimavayaṃ sampattā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:883_11: tehi saddhiṃ sattasantānassa pamāṇaṃ dassento “tesu hī”tiādimāha,
tika-s0301t0:886_2: Titthiyānaṃ bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca alābhāya ayasāya parisakkanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:886_4: Yathā taṃ sabbadisāsu yamakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā mahāoghaṃ viya sabbā pāramiyo “imasmiṃyeva attabhāve
tika-s0301t0:886_5: vipākaṃ dassāmā”ti sampiṇḍitā viya lābhasakkāramahoghaṃ nibbattayiṃsu.
tika-s0301t0:886_8: kahaṃ devadevo narāsabho lokanātho”ti bhagavantaṃ pariyesanti,
tika-s0301t0:886_9: sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ
tika-s0301t0:886_10: āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anuvattanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya.
tika-s0301t0:886_11: Sabbaṃ khandhake tesu tesu suttesu ca āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:886_15: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvara…pe…
tika-s0301t0:886_19: etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda,
tika-s0301t0:886_20: aññaṃ ekaṃ saṅghampi ekaṃ gaṇampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lābhaggayasaggappattaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:887_0: Evaṃ pucchituṃ ayuttaṃ titthiyānaṃ kathā mahājanasannipāte niyyātitā hotīti.
tika-s0301t0:887_7: Pubbe avisesato deyyadhammassa dātabbaṭṭhānaṃ nāma pucchitaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:887_8: idāni tassa mahapphalabhāvakaro dakkhiṇeyyavisesoti āha “aññaṃ tayā paṭhamaṃ pucchitaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:887_12: Pucchitassa nāma pañhassa kathanaṃ mayhameva bhāro.
tika-s0301t0:887_13: Samupabyūḷhoti ekato senāya rāsivasena sampiṇḍitoti attho.
tika-s0301t0:887_16: Dhanusippaṃ sikkhitvāpi koci katahattho na hoti,
tika-s0301t0:887_24: Asikkhitatādinā bhīrubhāvena vā kāyassa chambhanaṃ saṅkampanaṃ uttāso etassa atthīti chambhīti āha “pavedhitakāyo”ti.
tika-s0301t0:888_0: Dakkhiṇeyyatāya adhippetattā “arahattamaggena kāmacchando pahīno hotī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:888_1: Accantappahānassa icchitattā tatiyeneva kukkuccaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti paṭighasampayogaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:888_5: atha kho yaṃ kiñci asekkhasantāne pavattaṃ sīlaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:888_6: lokuttaro eva na adhippeto sikkhāya jātattā,
tika-s0301t0:888_10: catūsu maggesu heṭṭhimesu ca tīsu phalesu sīlakkhandho.
tika-s0301t0:888_14: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vipassakassa sīlassa adhippetattā tathā attho vutto.
tika-s0301t0:888_16: Ettha ca yathā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā missakā adhippetā,
tika-s0301t0:889_2: Yassā vāyodhātuyā vasena sarīraṃ sañjātathāmaṃ hoti,
tika-s0301t0:889_5: tena tato aññaṃ balarūpaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-s0301t0:890_2: Ete dveti khanti soraccanti ete dve dhammā.
tika-s0301t0:890_4: yo koci jalāsayo yaṃ kiñci pānīyaṭṭhānanti āha “caturassapokkharaṇīādīnī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:891_2: saddena akhīṇāsavassa dentopīti imamatthaṃ dasseti yassa kassacipi dentenapi kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā vippasannacitteneva dātabbattā.
tika-s0301t0:892_0: Pakiraṇaṃ nāma vikiraṇampi hoti anekatthattā dhātūnanti āha “vikiratī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:892_1: Pakiranto viya vā dānaṃ detīti iminā guṇakhettameva apariyesitvā karuṇākhettepi mahādānaṃ pavattetīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:892_2: Tena “pakiretī”ti vadantena bhagavatā aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgatatitthiyavādena appaṭisedhitatāpi dīpitā hoti.
tika-s0301t0:892_6: Yathāyaṃ puññadhārā dātāraṃ anto sineheti pūreti abhisandeti,
tika-s0301t0:892_7: evaṃ paṭiggāhakānampi anto sineheti pūreti abhisandeti.
tika-s0301t0:892_8: Tenevāha “dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū”tiādi evaṃ santepi “dātāraṃ abhivassatī”ti vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dāyakavaseneva “sinehetī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:892_9: yasmā vā paṭiggāhakassa sinehuppatti āmisanissitāti dāyakavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:895_3: Pathavimaṇḍalassa mahantatā taṃnivāsinaṃ anuyantatāti sabbamidaṃ yathicchitassa rājakiccassa sukhena samijjhanassa kāraṇakittanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:895_7: Corā cintayiṃsūti eko antarabhogiko rājāparādhiko pañcasatamanussaparivāro coriyaṃ karonto vicarati,
tika-s0301t0:896_1: Dhuravihāreti rathassa dhuraṃ viya nagarassa dhurabhūte vihāre.
tika-s0301t0:896_9: Saṇhakaraṇīyaṃ atisaṇhaṃ pisanto nisadapoto viya pisanto.
tika-s0301t0:897_0: Dhammacariyātiādittampi sīsaṃ celañca ajjhupekkhitvā sammāpaṭipatti eva kātabbā tassā eva paraloke patiṭṭhābhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:897_2: kathento ca yathā tamatthaṃ sammadeva rājā jānāti,
tika-s0301t0:897_5: Visinoti bandhati yathādhippetaṃ cittaṃ etenāti visayo,
tika-s0301t0:898_6: Hatthiyuddhādīhi jarāmaraṇaṃ jinituṃ na sakkā sattassa avisayabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:898_10: Ratanattaye hi saddhā niviṭṭhā mūlajātā patiṭṭhitā ekantato jarāmaraṇavijayāya hoti.
tika-s0301t0:905_2: taṃ uruvelagāmaṃ abhimukhabhāvena sammadeva sabbadhamme bujjhatīti abhisambodhi,
tika-s0301t0:905_4: tena samannāgatattā ca bhagavā abhisambuddhoti vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:905_5: Tassa pañcacattālīsāya vassesu ādito pannarasa vassāni paṭhamabodhi,
tika-s0301t0:905_6: idha pana sattāhabbhantarameva adhippetanti āha “abhisambuddho hutvā antosattāhasmiṃ yevā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:905_7: Asukhabhāvena aññehi kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā dukkaraṃ karotīti dukkarakāro,
tika-s0301t0:905_10: Yadi evaṃ kasmā taṃ lokanātho chabbassāni samanuyuñjati?
tika-s0301t0:907_0: Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
tika-s0301t0:912_3: Sā cassa pāpatamatā pāpavuttitāyāti āha “pāpe niyutto”ti.
tika-s0301t0:913_5: so ca kammavādīhi anuyuñjiyamāno devatthāya siyāti āha “amarabhāvatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:913_13: Ubhosu passesu phiyāhi ākaḍḍheyya ceva arittehi uppīḷeyya ca.
tika-s0301t0:914_1: Samādhino hi gahaṇena sammāvāyāmasatisamādhayo gahitā upakārabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:914_5: Kathaṃ pana maggaṃ maggatthāya bhāvetīti āha “yathā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:914_11: evañca katvā ‘pattosmi paramasuddhi’nti idampi vacanaṃ samatthita”nti vadanti,
tika-s0301t0:917_3: Pāsāṇaphalake mahācīvaraṃ sīse ṭhapetvāti etena taṃ phalakaṃ apassāya nisinnoti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:917_6: bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto anupubbasamāpattiyo phalasamāpattiñca manasikarontoti attho.
tika-s0301t0:918_3: Na hi tena mārassa kāci atthasiddhīti.
tika-s0301t0:924_5: taṃ atthaṃ sādhentiyevāti etassa atthassa dīpako sammā- saddo.
tika-s0301t0:924_6: Yonisosammāsaddena hi upāyakāraṇatthadīpakataṃ sandhāya “upāyavīriyena kāraṇavīriyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:924_9: bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvā vuttaṃ “arahattaṃ patvāpi na tussatī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:925_6: Na me samaṇa mokkhasīti idaṃ māro “anuttarā vimutti anuppattā,
tika-s0301t0:925_7: vimuttā sabbapāsehī”ti ca bhagavato vacanaṃ asaddahanto vadati saddahantopi vā “evamayaṃ paresaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-s0301t0:925_8: mokkhāya ussāhaṃ na kareyyā”ti attano kohaññe ṭhatvā vadati.
tika-s0301t0:928_2: Evaṃ hi gatesūti evaṃ tumhesu bahūsu ekajjhaṃ gatesu.
tika-s0301t0:929_6: tassā ca sīlaṃ samādhi ca mūlanti āha “sīlasamādhayo vā ādī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:929_10: nibbānasacchikiriyā pana sammāpaṭipattiyā pariyosānaṃ tato paraṃ kattabbābhāvatoti āha “phalanibbānāni pariyosāna”nti.
tika-s0301t0:929_18: diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti vacanato sīladiṭṭhujukatāya matthakabhūtā vipassanā,
tika-s0301t0:929_19: tadadhiṭṭhānā sīlasamādhīti ime tassa sāsanassa mūlanti āha “sīlasamādhivipassanā vā ādī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:930_1: yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena apekkhitesu gāthāti samaññā,
tika-s0301t0:930_2: taṃ tato bhinnaṃ viya katvā dassento “catuppadikagāthāya tāva paṭhamapādo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:930_3: Pañcapadachappadānaṃ gāthānaṃ ādipariyosānaggahaṇena itare dutiyādayo tayo cattāro vā majjhanti avuttasiddhamevāti na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:930_4: Ekānusandhikasuttassāti idaṃ bahuvibhāgaṃ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:930_5: itarassa pana teyeva desetabbadhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānabhāgā labbhanti.
tika-s0301t0:930_11: Anekānusandhīkassa saha nidānena paṭhamo anusandhi ādi.
tika-s0301t0:931_6: Avisesato tisso sikkhā sakale sāsane bhavanti.
tika-s0301t0:931_7: Dhammoti pana brahmacariyaṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ “katamesānaṃ kho, bhante,
tika-s0301t0:931_8: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0301t0:934_7: Taṃ pana yasmā bhastavātehi pūritaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0301t0:934_9: Niyāmabhūmiyanti bhagavato paṭisallānaṭṭhāne sañcarantaṃ māraṃ maṃsacakkhunāva disvā.
tika-s0301t0:935_5: Vossajja careyya tattha soti iminā bhagavā taṃ byākaramāno vibhiṃsitā buddhānaṃ kiṃ karissati bhayābhāvato?
tika-s0301t0:935_6: Kevalaṃ pana anaṭṭhavalikaṃ uppīḷento viya tvameva āyāsaṃ āpajjissasīti māraṃ santajjeti.
tika-s0301t0:936_4: Urasmiṃ cārayeyyunti phāsuṃ vijjhituṃ ṭhapeyyuṃ uggireyyuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:936_6: Tāṇaṃ karonti nāmāti tato bhayanimittato attano tāṇaṃ karonti nāma.
tika-s0301t0:939_7: Soppapariggāhakenāti ettha soppaṃ nāma niddāya antarantarā pavattakiriyamayacittappavattirahitā nirantarabhavaṅgasantatīti
tika-s0301t0:939_8: taṃ sabhāvato payojanato kālaparicchedato pariggāhakaṃ upariniddesasatisampajaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “soppapariggāhakena
tika-s0301t0:940_0: Kiṃ nūti etthaṃ kinti hetunissakke paccattavacananti āha “kasmā nu supasī”ti?
tika-s0301t0:940_2: so pana matasadiso visaññisadiso ca hotīti āha “mato viya visaññī viya cā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:941_1: saddena “bāhirassa upādāya aṭṭhārasā”tiādinā āgataṃ taṇhākoṭṭhāsaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0301t0:941_2: Tattha tattha visattatāyāti tammiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe visesato āsattabhāvena.
tika-s0301t0:941_3: Visassa dukkhanibbattakakammassa hetubhāvato visamūlatā visaṃ vā dukkhadukkhādibhūtavedanā mūlaṃ etassāti visamūlā, taṇhā.
tika-s0301t0:941_6: Katthaci netunti katthaci bhave sabbathā netuṃ?
tika-s0301t0:941_8: Tuyhaṃ kiṃ etthāti sabbupadhiparikkhayā suddhassa mama paṭipattiyaṃ tuyhaṃ kiṃ ujjhāyanaṃ?
tika-s0301t0:947_1: Paṇṇāsaṃ vā vassāni jīvati vassasatato upari seyyathāpi thero anuruddho.
tika-s0301t0:947_2: Saṭṭhi vā vassāni seyyathāpi thero bākulo.
tika-s0301t0:947_3: Paṭiharitvā paccanīkabhāve sātaṃ sukhaṃ etassāti paccanīkasāto,
tika-s0301t0:948_1: Evanti so dārako viya kiñci acintento sappuriso careyya,
tika-s0301t0:948_2: evaṃ hissa cittadukkhaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:948_3: Pajjalitasīso viya careyyāti yathā pajjalitasīso puriso aññaṃ kiñci akatvā tasseva vūpasamāya vāyameyya,
tika-s0301t0:948_4: evaṃ sappuriso āyuṃ parittanti ñatvā teneva nayena sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ aniccaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:948_6: anattāti vipassanampi otaritvā taṃ ussukkāpentopi saṅkhāravigamāya careyya paṭipajjeyya.
tika-s0301t0:951_3: Tathābhūto pana so taṃ ajahantovāti āha “na vijahatī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:951_4: Āyu anupariyāyatīti maccānaṃ āyu gatampi paccāgacchatīti bhagavato paṭāṇi hutvā vadati,
tika-s0301t0:951_5: bhagavā pana taṃ abhibhavitvā “accayanti ahorattā”tiādinā āyuno accayagamanamaraṇataṃyeva pavedesi.
tika-s0301t0:956_1: Pavijjhīti pabbataṃ sabbato pavattento tato tato nissajji.
tika-s0301t0:959_2: Yathā sā bhagavato desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ attano paññācakkhunā na passituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0301t0:959_5: Vināsetuṃ na sakkoti bheravārammaṇe bhāyanasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:962_2: Kabbakaraṇena mattoti kabbakiriyāpasutatādivasena matto kabbaṃ katvā.
tika-s0301t0:962_3: Kimidaṃ soppasevāti idaṃ tava soppaṃ kimatthaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:962_6: Atthaṃ samāgantvāti paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ sammā āgantvā adhigantvā.
tika-s0301t0:965_3: Tesu anurodhavirodhesu tannimittaṃ sajjati nāma saṅgaṃ karoti nāma,
tika-s0301t0:965_7: tasmā anukampake hitesake sammāsambuddhe anurodhavirodhe āropetvā vikampanatthaṃ micchā vadasīti.
tika-s0301t0:971_1: Pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ lakkhaṇādīni ceva samudayañca assādādīnavanissaraṇāni ca gahetvā sammā tesaṃ
tika-s0301t0:971_2: lakkhaṇādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti āha “pañca upādānakkhandhe ādiyitvā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:971_4: saddena rasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni ceva samudayādīni ca saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0301t0:971_6: hatthāmalakaṃ viya pākaṭe vibhūte katvā vibhāveti.
tika-s0301t0:971_7: Gaṇhāpetīti te dhamme manasā anupekkhite diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhe karonto uggaṇhāpeti.
tika-s0301t0:971_8: Samādānamhīti tattha atthassa sammadeva ādiyane khandhānañca sammasanavasena aññadhammavasena samādiyane.
tika-s0301t0:971_10: taṃ nissāya paccattapurisakārena ca tesaṃ paṭividdhaguṇena.
tika-s0301t0:971_11: Jotāpetīti tesaṃ cittasantānaṃ assaddhiyādikilesamalavidhamanena pabhassaraṃ karoti.
tika-s0301t0:971_12: Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti tāya desanāya pāpetabbaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0301t0:972_0: Ete rūpādayo khandhe yañca saṅkhataṃ samiddhapaccayehi kataṃ,
tika-s0301t0:972_2: etaṃ mayhaṃ na hotī”ti passantoti yojanā.
tika-s0301t0:975_2: so eva sampayuttadhammo samosarati etthāti samosaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:975_11: Loko adhimucchitoti atithaddhakāyo viya mucchaṃ āpanno.
tika-s0301t0:978_4: Sayaṃcaradivaseti kumārakānañca kumārikānañca sayaṃ attanā caritabbachaṇadivase.
tika-s0301t0:978_13: Tāsaṃ sampattiyāti tāsaṃ dānaṃ dhammassavanañcāti tassā duvidhāyapi sampattiyā.
tika-s0301t0:979_1: tasmā ajānanassa “anāvajjanatāyā”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā sesakāraṇaṃ vadanto “buddhāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:979_2: Upacārabhedanti buddhaṃ disvā manussehi kātabbaupacārassa bhindanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:980_1: Tena na kevalaṃ bhagavā uppaṇḍanaṃ pariharanto taṃ gāmaṃ na puna pāvisi,
tika-s0301t0:980_2: atha kho māraṃ anukampantoti idaṃ visesaṃ joteti.
tika-s0301t0:981_1: janento ca yathā tato āyatiṃ thirataraṃ mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ nipphajjissati,
tika-s0301t0:981_4: Kiñcati maddati abhibhavatīti kiñcananti āha “maddituṃ samattha”nti.
tika-s0301t0:984_1: Nibbānaṃ apadisitvāti nibbānaṃ nissāya nibbānaguṇe ārabbhāti attho.
tika-s0301t0:984_2: Haṭahaṭakesoti ito cito ca vikiṇṇattā ākulākulakeso.
tika-s0301t0:984_3: Cakkhusamphassaviññāṇāyatananti ettha yathā cakkhuggahaṇena phasso visesito,
tika-s0301t0:984_5: Tathā sati cakkhuviññāṇassa ca gahaṇaṃ āpajjeyyāti.
tika-s0301t0:984_6: Nanu cettha cakkhuggahaṇena visesitattā cakkhudvārikānaṃ sabbesaṃ viññāṇānaṃ gahaṇanti?
tika-s0301t0:984_8: tañca kho paṭhamena cakkhuggahaṇenāti nāyaṃ doso.
tika-s0301t0:984_9: Bhavaṅgacittanti āvajjanāya anantarapaccayabhūtameva adhippetanti niyametvā dassetuṃ “sāvajjanaka”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:985_0: “Cakkhū”ti avisesato vuttattā pana mārassa ayampi attho āpannoti dassetuṃ “yaṃ loke”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:985_1: Upakkavipakkanti cakkhupākarogena upari heṭṭhā ca sabbaso pakkaṃ kuthitaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:985_2: Eseva nayoti iminā yaṃ loke kuṭṭhakilāsagaṇḍakacchuādīhi upaddutaṃ vaṇapīḷakādivasena paggharantaṃ asuciṃ antamaso paramajeguccharūpampi,
tika-s0301t0:985_3: sabbaṃ taṃ taveva hotūti evamādiṃ apadisati.
tika-s0301t0:986_1: pabbajitā ca yaṃ pattacīvarādiṃ “mama ida”nti abhinivisantāva vadanti,
tika-s0301t0:986_2: etesu pariggahatthesu ca tesaṃ pariggāhakapuggalesu ca te cittaṃ yadi atthi,
tika-s0301t0:986_3: tāni ārabbha tava cittaṃ yadi bhavati,
tika-s0301t0:986_4: evaṃ tvaṃ tattha baddho eva hosīti attho.
tika-s0301t0:987_0: Yaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ vadantīti yathāvuttaṃ upakaraṇaṃ loke bahujanā “mama ida”nti vadanti.
tika-s0301t0:987_1: Na taṃ mayhanti taṃ mayhaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0301t0:987_2: na tattha mama taṇhāvasena mamanti natthi.
tika-s0301t0:987_3: Na te ahanti ye puggalā ettha baddhā,
tika-s0301t0:987_6: Na me maggampi dakkhasīti evaṃ sabbaso baddhābhāvena muttassa me gatamaggampi māra tvaṃ na dakkhasi na passissasi,
tika-s0301t0:987_8: tesu bhavayonigatiādīsu mayhaṃ gatamaggaṃ na passissasi bhavanissaṭṭhattāti.
tika-s0301t0:990_5: Ajinanti antogadhahetuatthaṃ vadatīti āha “parassa dhanajāniṃ akarontenā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:990_8: Kasmā bhagavā evaṃ cintesīti tattha kāraṇamāha “itī”tiādinā.
tika-s0301t0:990_9: Rajje vijite daṇḍakarapīḷiteti dhanadaṇḍādidaṇḍena ceva balinā ca bādhite.
tika-s0301t0:991_2: Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā.
tika-s0301t0:991_3: Yuttayānanti yathā yuttānaṃ ājaññarathānaṃ sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati,
tika-s0301t0:991_6: Vatthukatāti sabbaso upakkilesasodhanena iddhivisayatāya patiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā.
tika-s0301t0:991_7: Avijahitāti paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato subhāvitabhāvena taṃtaṃadhiṭṭhānayogyatāya na jahāpitā.
tika-s0301t0:991_8: Niccānubaddhāti tato eva niccaṃ anubaddhā viya katā.
tika-s0301t0:992_1: Pabbato assāti pabbato bhaveyya kīdisassāti āha “suvaṇṇassā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:992_3: Dvikkhattumpi tāva mahantoti yattako so pabbato hoti,
tika-s0301t0:992_5: Ekassāti ekassapi puggalassa nālaṃ na pariyatto taṇhāya duppūraṇabhāvā.
tika-s0301t0:992_6: Evaṃ jānantoti evaṃ taṇhāya duppūraṇabhāvādīnavataṃ jānanto.
tika-s0301t0:992_7: Samaṃ careyyāti paravatthuparāmāsādiṃ vihāya kāyādīhi samameva paṭipajjeyya.
tika-s0301t0:993_4: Yatonidānaṃ hotīti yaṃnidānaṃ yaṃkāraṇaṃ taṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t0:993_5: Evaṃ yo adakkhīti yo pariññātavatthuko evaṃ dukkhaṃ tassa nidānabhūte kāmaguṇe ca tathato paññācakkhunā passi.
tika-s0301t0:993_11: Tameva kāmābhibhūto nappaṭiseveyya na laggeyyāti evaṃ vinayāya vūpasamāya sikkheyyāti.
tika-s0301t0:998_5: Sīsaṃ okampetvāti ettha ativiya sīsassa okampitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “hanukena uraṃ paharanto adhonataṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:998_8: Tisākhanti tibhaṅgabhakuṭi viya nalāṭe jātattā nalāṭikaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1001_1: Mayhaṃ lābhāti evarūpassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa satthussa paṭilābho,
tika-s0301t0:1001_2: evarūpassa ca nāma niyyānikassa saddhammassa paṭilābho,
tika-s0301t0:1001_5: Mayhaṃ suladdhanti yañcetaṃ mama niyyānikasāsane pabbajjā upasampadā,
tika-s0301t0:1001_7: Yathā panassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko uppanno,
tika-s0301t0:1001_11: Evamahosīti “lābhā vata me”tiādinā evaṃ parivitakko ahosi.
tika-s0301t0:1001_13: Tasmiṃyeva ṭhāneti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnaṃ māro upasaṅkami,
tika-s0301t0:1001_16: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyanti kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṃ sappāyaṃ upakārāvahaṃ bhavissati.
tika-s0301t0:1002_5: Keci “kāmaṃ karassūti āyasmato ‘kāmā’ti mārassa ālapana”nti vadanti.
tika-s0301t0:1002_8: Vippakāratthopi hi rūpasaddo “rūpaṃ dasseti anappaka”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0301t0:1007_0: Jalamānāti samuṭṭhitaniyataiddhiyā anaññasādhāraṇaparivārasampattiyā ca sadevake loke jalamānā.
tika-s0301t0:1007_1: Maṃsacakkhu dibbacakkhu dhammacakkhu paññācakkhu samantacakkhūti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā.
tika-s0301t0:1007_5: Anavasesato mānaṃ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1007_8: Sikkhamānoti sikkhāni bhāvento attano santāne uppādento.
tika-s0301t0:1008_0: Vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvāti uppannaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ paṭicca uppannaattakilamathaṃ anuppādanavasena vikkhambhetvā
tika-s0301t0:1008_1: taṃyeva vedanaṃ pariggahetvā pavattavipassanā vīthimeva otaratīti katvā mūlakammaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1008_2: “Samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyī”ti vatvā tassa pabhedaṃ vibhajitvā idhādhippetaṃ dassetuṃ “samasīsī nāma tividho hotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:1009_5: Evaṃ sati teneva iriyāpathena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā teneva iriyāpathena,
tika-s0301t0:1009_6: ekasmiṃ antorogeyeva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāyantā khīṇāsavā bahavopi samasīsino eva sambhaveyyuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1010_14: Imesu terasasu sīsesu palibodhasīsādīni pavattisīsañca pariyādiyitabbāni,
tika-s0301t0:1010_18: pariyādāyakassa maggassa phalassa ca ārammaṇaṃ saṅkhārasīsaṃ saṅkhāravivekabhūto nirodhoti pariyādiyitabbānaṃ
tika-s0301t0:1010_19: pariyādāyakaphalārammaṇānaṃ saha viya saṃsiddhaṃ dassanena samasīsibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ terasa
tika-s0301t0:1010_21: Idha pana “apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañcā”ti vacanato tesu kilesapavattasīsānameva
tika-s0301t0:1011_0: Tattha pavattisīsaṃ pavattato vuṭṭhahanto maggo cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena yadipi pariyādīyati,
tika-s0301t0:1011_2: tāva pavattisabbhāvato “pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ khepetī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:1011_3: Kilesapariyādānena pana maggacittena attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā paccavekkhaṇavārā ca kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-s0301t0:1011_4: “Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti vacanato paccavekkhaṇaparisamāpanena kilesapariyādānaṃ samāpitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0301t0:1011_5: taṃ pana parisamāpanaṃ yadi cuticittena hoti,
tika-s0301t0:1011_6: teneva jīvitaparisamāpanañca hotīti imāya vāracutisamatāya kilesapariyādānajīvitapariyādānānaṃ apubbācarimatā
tika-s0301t0:1011_7: veditabbāti dassento “dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ ekato uppādo natthī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:1011_11: Kiñcāpi “eko vā dve vā”ti vuttaṃ yathā “ekaṃ vā dve vā tadārammaṇacittānī”ti,
tika-s0301t0:1013_7: Sati hi uppāde patiṭṭhitaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-s0301t0:1013_8: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yadeva tassa viññāṇassa appatiṭṭhānakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:1014_0: Sokena phuṭṭhassāti “aphalo vata me vāyāmo jāto”ti sokena abhibhūtassa.
tika-s0301t0:1014_1: Abhassathāti balavasokābhitunnassa satisammosā sithilaṃ gahitā bhassi patitā sā kacchā.
tika-s0301t0:1017_1: Yasmā kapilavatthuto nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya māro otārāpekkho lokanāthaṃ anubandhituṃ āraddho,
tika-s0301t0:1017_3: Atigahetvāti anugantvā tassa yathāruci paṭipattiṃ anuvatto viya hutvā.
tika-s0301t0:1018_0: Avajjhāyantoti pajjhāyanto. Jito vittaparājito asi nu. Pamāṇātikkantanti garutaraṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1020_0: Pehīti apehi. Pāragāminoti pāraṅgamanasīlā. Tekāliko ayaṃ gāmi-saddoti āha “yepī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:1025_3: Ekasataṃ ekasatanti ekasataṃ ekasataṃ paccekaṃ sataṃ satanti attho.
tika-s0301t0:1025_6: Tā kira paṭhamaṃ kaññārūpena attānaṃ dassesuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1025_13: Ettāvatā bālā taruṇī porīti tividhāsu itthīsu purimā dve dassitā,
tika-s0301t0:1025_14: pariyosānavāresu manussajātikānaṃ manussitthiyova ruccantīti tena manussarūpena tā attānaṃ dassesuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1026_3: Sā hi kilesasenā accharāsaṅghātasabhāvāpi paṭipatthayamānā piyāyitabbaicchitabbarūpabhāvato piyarūpasātarūpā nāma attano kiccavasena.
tika-s0301t0:1026_4: Eko ahaṃ jhāyantoti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca abhāvato eko asahāyo ahaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena nijjhāyanto.
tika-s0301t0:1027_1: Idha dutiyapadassa attho vissajjanagāthāvaṇṇanāyameva āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0301t0:1027_2: Anāmantena “taṃ puggala”nti sammukhā ṭhitampi bhagavantaṃ asammukhā viya katvā vadati,
tika-s0301t0:1028_0: “Avitakkajhāyī”ti vakkhamānattā ayamevettha kāyapassaddhi veditabbāti āha “catutthajjhānena assāsapassāsakāyassa passaddhattā passaddhakāyo”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1028_7: Diyaḍḍhakilesasahassanti khuddakavatthuvibhaṅge āgatesu aṭṭhasu kilesasatesu aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni apanetvā sesā paññāsādhikaṃ sataṃ kilesā,
tika-s0301t0:1028_8: te brahmajāle āgatāhi dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīhi saha pañcapaññāsādhikaṃ sattasataṃ hoti;
tika-s0301t0:1028_9: tā ca uppannānuppannabhāvena diguṇitā diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ dasādhikaṃ hoti;
tika-s0301t0:1028_10: taṃ appakaṃ pana ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanupagaṃ na hotīti “diyaḍḍhakilesasahassa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1029_0: Pañcadvārikakilesoghaṃ tiṇṇoti channaṃ dvārānaṃ vasena pavattanakilesoghaṃ taritvā ṭhito.
tika-s0301t0:1029_1: Kāmoghadiṭṭhoghabhavoghaṭṭhakilesabhāvato “pañcoghaggahaṇena vā pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni veditabbānī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:1029_2: Rūparāgādayo visesato na pañcadvārikāti vuttaṃ “chaṭṭhaggahaṇena pañcuddhambhāgiyāni veditabbānī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1030_0: Maccurājassāti sambandhe sāmivacananti dassento “maccurājassa hatthato”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:1031_1: “Idamavocā”ti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetvāti etena saṃyuttesu ayaṃ nigamanapāḷi,
tika-s0301t0:1031_2: heṭṭhā anāgatanayattā pana kesuci potthakesu na likhīyatīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:1031_3: Daddallamānāti jajjakārassa hi daddakāraṃ katvā niddeso.
tika-s0301t0:1031_5: Nīharīti tāsaṃ kāyavacīvikāraṃ na manasikaronto tiṇāyapi amaññamānova anapekkheneva nīhari.
tika-s0301t0:1037_3: Dhanaṃ samādapetvāti cetiyassa rājā ekaṃ mukhaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:1037_6: janapadānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā seṭṭhi ekanti evaṃ catūsu mukhesu navakamme kayiramāne seṭṭhinā gahitamukhe
tika-s0301t0:1037_7: kamme olīyamāne eko upāsako ariyasāvako pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā janapadaṃ gantvā “yo yaṃ dātuṃ ussahati
tika-s0301t0:1037_8: hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā sattavidharatanaṃ vā haritālaṃ vā manosilaṃ vā,
tika-s0301t0:1037_9: so dhanaṃ detū”ti samādapetvā yathāladdhaṃ paṭhamaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pesetvā “navakammaṃ niṭṭhita”nti sutvā
tika-s0301t0:1037_10: ekakaṃ āgacchantaṃ antarāmagge corā palibundhitvā tato kiñcipi dhanaṃ alabhantā “sace naṃ muñcissāma,
tika-s0301t0:1037_12: Anaparādhe ariyasāvake aparādhakā te corā andhā jātā,
tika-s0301t0:1037_13: tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ “andhavana”nti paññāyitthāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1037_14: Khīṇāsavānaṃ yasmā yattha katthaci cittaviveko hotiyeva upadhivivekassa siddhattā.
tika-s0301t0:1038_4: Vinivijjhanaṭṭhenāti hadayaṃ vinividdhena hadayamhi vijjhitvā dukkhuppādanena khandhānaṃ ete pañca kāmā sattisūlasadisā.
tika-s0301t0:1041_3: Dvaṅgulapaññāyāti ettha itthiyo hi daharakumārikākālato paṭṭhāya odanapacanavidhiṃ anutiṭṭhantiyo ukkhaliyaṃ
tika-s0301t0:1041_4: udakaṃ tāpetvā taṇḍule pakkhipitvā attano buddhiyā tesaṃ pākakālappamāṇaṃ paricchindituṃ tāni dabbiyā
tika-s0301t0:1041_5: uddharitvāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānaggahaṇamattena pakkāpakkabhāvaṃ jānituṃ na sakkonti,
tika-s0301t0:1041_6: kevalaṃ pana dvīhi aṅgulīhi uppīḷitakāle eva jānanti,
tika-s0301t0:1041_8: Phalasamāpattiñāṇappavattikittanena catūsu saccesu asammohavihāro dīpito hotīti āha “ñāṇamhi vattamānamhīti phalasamāpattiñāṇe pavattamāne”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1041_9: Vipassantassāti asammohapaṭivedhato visesena passantassa khandhapañcakameva saccābhisamayato pubbabhāge vipassantassa.
tika-s0301t0:1041_10: Aññaṃ vāti itthipurisato aññaṃ vā kiñci vatthuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1041_11: “Ahaṃ asmī”ti mānadiṭṭhigāhataṇhāgāhavasena gahitavatthusmiṃ yevāti āha “ahaṃ asmīti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasenā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1044_2: kissa ayaṃ bhikkhunī hutvā samaṇadhammaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesīti tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “pubbe kirā”tiādimāraddhaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1044_4: Dārusākanti addhamāsakena dāruṃ sākañca āharissāmīti antarāpaṇe antaravīthiṃ gatā.
tika-s0301t0:1046_5: Puttamaraṇaṃ antaṃ atītaṃ idāni puttamaraṇassa abhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1046_7: Purisaṃ gavesitunti yathā mayhaṃ purisagavesanā nāma sabbaso natthi,
tika-s0301t0:1046_10: sabbesu khandhādīsu bhavādīsu ca taṇhānandiyā abhāvakathanena sabbasattesu taṇhā sabbaso visositā,
tika-s0301t0:1046_11: tassāyeva kārakaavijjākkhandho padālitoti attano nikkilesataṃ pavedentī therī sīhanādaṃ nadīti.
tika-s0301t0:1049_4: Ātatantiādīsu ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekatalaṃ tūriyaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1049_12: Cammapariyonaddhaṃ sesaṃ tantibaddhaṃ sabbaṃ ātatavitataṃ nāma,
tika-s0301t0:1049_22: Uggharitapaggharitaṭṭhenāti upari gharaṇena ca vissandanena ca.
tika-s0301t0:1049_24: Arūpaṭṭhāyinoti sattādhiṭṭhānenāyaṃ dhammadesanāti āha “sabbatthāti sabbesu rūpārūpabhavesū”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1052_1: Aggato paṭṭhāyāti sabbaaggato pabhuti yāva mūlā antarāyuttaṃ sammadeva pupphitaṃ sālarukkhaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1052_2: Vaṇṇadhātusīsena vaṇṇadhātusampannaṃ dutiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vadatīti āha “tayā sadisā aññā bhikkhunī natthī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1052_3: Pakhumasīsena akkhibhaṇḍaṃ vuccatīti āha “pakhumantarikāyanti dvinnaṃ akkhīnaṃ majjhe”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1058_0: 168. Punappunaṃ…pe… āgacchanti kāraṇassa asamūhatattā. Santāpito kilesasantāpehi. Agatīti avisayo.
tika-s0301t0:1061_2: kassacipi pāsaṇḍassa aruccanato monamaggassa appaṭipajjanato tava samaṇibhāvaṃ nānupassāmīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:1061_4: yathā tattha diṭṭhipāse sattānaṃ cittaṃ paṭimukkaṃ hoti,
tika-s0301t0:1061_6: Tathābhūtā ca te sattānaṃ citte khittā viya hontīti āha “cittesu diṭṭhipāsaṃ khipantīti attho”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1061_7: Pāse mocetīti diṭṭhipāse sattānaṃ cittasantānato nīharati dhammasudhammatāya.
tika-s0301t0:1061_9: “Ito bahiddhāyeva pāsaṇḍā hontī”ti vuttassa atthassa nigamanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1061_10: Evañca katvā sabbepi bāhirakasamaye sandhāya cūḷasīhanādasutte “channavuti pāsaṇḍā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1061_11: Pasīdantīti diṭṭhipaṅke saṃsārapaṅke ca pakārehi agādhā osīdanti.
tika-s0301t0:1062_2: Sabbāni akusalakammāni kusalakammāni ca khīṇāni etthāti sabbakammakkhayo,
tika-s0301t0:1062_4: Upadhayo sammadeva khīyanti etthāti upadhisaṅkhayo, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1065_1: Kenidaṃ pakataṃ bimbanti idaṃ attabhāvasaññitaṃ bimbaṃ brahmā-
tika-s0301t0:1065_3: pajāpatiādīsu kena kataṃ nimmitaṃ nibbattitanti kattabbamohaṃ nāma kātukāmo pucchati.
tika-s0301t0:1068_3: Yathā na hi sattasaññitasaṅkhārapuñjo nāma paramatthato upalabbhati,
tika-s0301t0:1068_4: evaṃ tabbinimutto nāma koci na upalabbhati avijjamānattā.
tika-s0301t0:1068_7: Vavatthitesūti paccekaṃ paccayavisesasamuṭṭhitaṃ saṇṭhānavisesaṃ upādāya “puriso hatthī asso”tiādinā abhisaṅgato pavattesu.
tika-s0301t0:1068_11: Vuttaṃ hetaṃ bhagavatā “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti añño neva sambhoti yathāvuttadukkhato aññassa saṅkhatadhammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1068_12: Na nirujjhatīti tato aññaṃ na nirujjhati,
tika-s0301t0:1074_1: Parivitakko udapādīti dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇahetuko dhammadesanāya appossukko uppajji.
tika-s0301t0:1074_3: Kattha ca udapādīti taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “sabbabuddhāna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1074_4: Tattha āciṇṇasamāciṇṇoti ācarito ceva ācarantehi ca sammadeva ācaritoti attho.
tika-s0301t0:1074_5: Etena ayaṃ parivitakko sabbabuddhānaṃ paṭhamābhisambodhiyaṃ uppajjatevāti ayamettha dhammatāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:1074_6: Tattha aṭṭhame sattāheti idaṃ sattamasattāhato paraṃ sattāhabbhantare uppannattā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:1074_7: na pana itaresaṃ viya aṭṭhamassa nāma sattāhassa pavattitassa sabbhāvā.
tika-s0301t0:1075_0: Paṭividdhoti sayambhuñāṇena “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā paṭimukhaṃ nibbijjhanavasena patto,
tika-s0301t0:1075_3: Gambhīroti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho.
tika-s0301t0:1075_6: so ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato visesato ca passituṃ na sakkāti āha “gambhīrattāva duddaso”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1075_7: Dukkhena daṭṭhabboti kicchena kenaci kadācideva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t0:1075_9: tassa ogāhetvā anu anu bujjhanako kadāci natthīti āha “duddasattāva duranubodho”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1075_13: katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā”ti suttapadaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1075_16: Attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ nītoti vā paṇīto.
tika-s0301t0:1075_18: Tattha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti santārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:1075_25: Tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya saṇhasukhumasabhāvattā ca nipuṇo.
tika-s0301t0:1075_26: Bālānaṃ avisayattā yathāvuttehi paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti paṇḍitavedanīyo.
tika-s0301t0:1076_1: atthako pana ṭhānanti ca paṭiccasamuppādo eva adhippeto.
tika-s0301t0:1076_6: Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā yathā “devo eva devatā”.
tika-s0301t0:1076_7: Idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano phalaṃ pati paccayabhāvo uppādanasamatthatā idappaccayatā.
tika-s0301t0:1076_17: Sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādi sabbanti sabbasaṅkhārasamathādiabhidheyyaṃ sabbaṃ atthato nibbānameva.
tika-s0301t0:1076_18: Idāni assa nibbānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1076_22: Tathā santā ca savisesaṃ upasantā nāma hontīti āha “vūpasammantī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1076_23: Etena sabbe saṅkhārā sammanti etthāti sabbasaṅkhārasamatho,
tika-s0301t0:1076_25: Sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyutte hi nibbāne sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamapariyāyo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto eva.
tika-s0301t0:1077_4: Sabbe kilesarāgāti kāmarāgarūparāgādibhedā sabbepi kilesabhūtā rāgā,
tika-s0301t0:1077_10: Virajjantīti palujjanti vikkhambhanato sabbaso tena visaṃyuttabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1077_12: Bhavena bhavanti tena tena bhavena bhavantaraṃ bhavanikantibhāvena saṃsibbati.
tika-s0301t0:1077_13: Phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ sataṇhasseva āyatiṃ punabbhavabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1077_14: Tato vānato nikkhantaṃ tattha tassa sabbaso abhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1077_15: Ciranisajjācirabhāsanehi piṭṭhiāgilāyanatālugalasosādivasena kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0301t0:1077_16: Sā ca kho desanāya atthamajānantānaṃ apaṭipajjantānañca vasena,
tika-s0301t0:1077_17: jānantānaṃ pana paṭipajjantānañca desanāya kāyaparissamopi satthu aparissamoyeva.
tika-s0301t0:1077_23: Ubhayanti cittakilamatho cittavihesā cāti ubhayampetaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi bodhimūle eva samucchinnattā.
tika-s0301t0:1077_29: Kappānaṃ satasahassaṃ cattāri ca asaṅkhyeyyāni sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva pāramiyo
tika-s0301t0:1077_30: pūretvā idāni samadhigatadhammarajjassa tattha appossukkatāpattidīpanatā gāthatthassa ca acchariyatā
tika-s0301t0:1078_3: iti vā byattanti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto.
tika-s0301t0:1078_6: ekaṃsena vā alaṃ nippayojanaṃ evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa pakāsituṃ desitunti yojanā.
tika-s0301t0:1078_7: Halanti vā alanti iminā samānatthapadaṃ “halanti vadāmī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0301t0:1078_8: Rāgadosaphuṭṭhehīti phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena rāgena dosena ca phuṭṭhehi abhibhūtehi.
tika-s0301t0:1079_1: Evaṃgatanti evaṃ aniccantiādinā ākārena pavattaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1079_2: Kāmarāgarattā ca bhavarāgarattā ca nīvaraṇehi nivutacittatāya diṭṭhirāgarattā viparītābhinivesena na dakkhanti yāthāvato dhammaṃ na paṭivijjhissanti.
tika-s0301t0:1079_4: Evaṃ gāhāpetunti aniccantiādinā sabhāvena yāthāvato dhammaṃ jānāpetuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1080_0: Dhammadesanāya appossukkatāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kasmā panā”tiādinā sayameva codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0301t0:1080_6: tattha ca bhagavato sātisayaṃ gāravanti taṃ dassetuṃ “tassa hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1080_7: Tattha paṭipakkhā nāma rāgādayo kilesā sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarattā.
tika-s0301t0:1080_8: Tesaṃ balavabhāvato ciraparibhāvanāya sattasantānato dubbisodhiyatāya te satte mattahatthino viya dubbalapurisaṃ
tika-s0301t0:1080_9: adhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā anekasatayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ sunicitaṃ ghanasannivesaṃ
tika-s0301t0:1080_12: Tattha ca anto amaṭṭhatāya kañjiyapuṇṇā lābu,
tika-s0301t0:1080_16: Hīnūpamā cetā rūpapabandhabhāvato acirakālikattā ca malīnatāya,
tika-s0301t0:1080_17: kilesasaṃkileso eva pana dubbisodhanīyataro anādikālikattā arūpanissitattā ca.
tika-s0301t0:1081_2: Gambhīropi dhammo paṭipakkhavidhamanena ñāṇena visadabhāvaṃ āpannena supākaṭo bhaveyya,
tika-s0301t0:1081_6: So garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ ajjhesanahetukoti paṇālikāya sattānaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā brahmāyācanānimittanti taṃ dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:1082_1: apparajaṃ akkhi paññācakkhu yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvāti katvā apparajakkhajātikāti imamatthaṃ dassento “paññāmaye”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:1082_2: Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ yesaṃ taṃsabhāvā apparajakkhajātikāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:1082_3: Assavanatāti “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya karaṇe paccattavacananti āha “assavanatāyā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1083_0: Rāgādimalena samalehi pūraṇādīhi chahi satthārehi satthupaṭiññehi kabbaracanāvasena cintākaviādibhāve
tika-s0301t0:1083_2: Te kira buddhakolāhalānussavena sañjātakutūhalaṃ lokaṃ vañcentā kohaññe ṭhatvā sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānantā yaṃ kañci adhammameva “dhammo”ti dīpesuṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1083_4: Apāpuretanti etaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti pihitaṃ nibbānamahādvāraṃ ariyamaggaṃ saddhammadesanāhatthena apāpura vivara.
tika-s0301t0:1084_0: Selo pabbato ucco hoti thiro ca,
tika-s0301t0:1084_1: na paṃsupabbato missakapabbato cāti āha “sele yathā pabbatamuddhanī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1084_7: Sā hi abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādoti abhidhamme āgatā.
tika-s0301t0:1087_0: Yathā hītiādīsu yathā ca pabbate ṭhatvā andhakāre heṭṭhā olokentassa purisassa khettakedārapāḷikuṭikāyo
tika-s0301t0:1087_1: tattha sayitamanussā ca na paññāyanti anujjalabhāvato,
tika-s0301t0:1087_3: evaṃ dhammapāsādamāruyha sattalokaṃ olokayato bhagavato ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti akatakalyāṇā sattā,
tika-s0301t0:1087_4: ñāṇagginā anujjalabhāvato anuḷārabhāvato ca rattiṃ khittā sarā viya honti,
tika-s0301t0:1087_5: katakalyāṇā pana bhabbapuggalā dūre ṭhitāpi bhagavato āpāthaṃ āgacchanti paripakkañāṇaggitāya samujjalabhāvato
tika-s0301t0:1087_6: uḷārasantānatāya himavantapabbato viya cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0301t0:1088_0: Garuṭṭhānīyaṃ payirupāsitvā garutaraṃ payojanaṃ uddissa abhipatthanā ajjhesanā,
tika-s0301t0:1088_1: sāpi atthato yācanāva hotīti āha “ajjhesananti yācana”nti.
tika-s0301t0:1088_2: Padesavisayaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ ahutvā buddhānaṃyeva āveṇikabhāvato idaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ “buddhacakkhū”ti vuccatīti
tika-s0301t0:1088_4: Tiṇṇaṃ magggañāṇānanti heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ “dhammacakkhū”ti nāmaṃ catusaccadhammadassanamattabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1088_6: aggamaggañāṇaṃ pana ñāṇakiccassa sikhāppattiyā dassanamattaṃ na hotīti “dhammacakkhū”ti na vuccati,
tika-s0301t0:1088_17: taṃ imāya atthavaṇṇanāya aññadatthu saṃsandatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1088_21: Taṃ dukkhāvahaṃ vajjaṃ viya bhayato passitabbanti vuttaṃ “paralokañceva vajjañca bhayato passantī”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1088_22: Sampattibhavato vā aññattā vipattibhavo paralokoti vuttaṃ “para…pe…
tika-s0301t0:1089_0: Ayaṃ panettha pāḷīti ettha “apparajakkhā”ti padānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ tassa tathābhāvasādhanapāḷi.
tika-s0301t0:1089_1: Saddhādīnañhi vimuttaparipācakadhammānaṃ balavabhāvo tappaṭipakkhānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ dubbalabhāve sati hoti.
tika-s0301t0:1089_2: Tesañca balavabhāvo saddhādīnaṃ dubbalabhāveti vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ savisesaṃ atthitānatthitāvasena
tika-s0301t0:1089_3: apparajakkhā mahārajakkhātiādayo pāḷiyaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā “saddho puggalo apparajakkho”tiādinā.
tika-s0301t0:1089_4: Khandhādayo eva lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko sampattibhavabhūto loko sampattibhavaloko,
tika-s0301t0:1089_11: Puna ekakadukādivasena lokaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “eko loko”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1089_12: Āhārādayo viya hi āhāraṭṭhitikā saṅkhārā sabbe lujjanaṭṭhena lokoti.
tika-s0301t0:1089_13: Tattha eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti yāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā,
tika-s0301t0:1089_14: tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1089_15: Dve lokātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t0:1089_16: Nāmaggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā.
tika-s0301t0:1090_0: Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphalānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
tika-s0301t0:1090_3: Atha vā na lujjati na palujjatīti yo gahito tathā na hoti,
tika-s0301t0:1090_4: so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā.
tika-s0301t0:1090_9: Vivaṭṭajjhāsayassa adhippetattā tassa ca sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ garahitabbaṃ vajjitabbañca hutvā upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ “sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjā,
tika-s0301t0:1090_11: Apparajakkhatādīsu pañcasu dukesu ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa katvā “paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1090_12: Atha vā anvayato byatirekato ca saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ jānātīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1090_13: Ettha ca apparajakkhādibhabbādivasena āvajjentassa bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, na ekekā.
tika-s0301t0:1091_3: Yāni hi udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pusanti vaḍḍhanti,
tika-s0301t0:1092_2: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena
tika-s0301t0:1092_3: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo “ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:1092_4: Ayaṃ vuccatīti saṃkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo “vipañcitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0301t0:1092_8: Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatti hoti.
tika-s0301t0:1092_9: Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0301t0:1092_10: Ayaṃ vuccati padaparamoti ayaṃ puggalo chabbidhaṃ byañjanapadaṃ chabbidhaṃ atthapadanti idaṃ padameva paramaṃ assāti padaparamoti vuccatīti attho.
tika-s0301t0:1093_0: Vāsanā hotīti desanā phalavohārena vāsanā hotīti vuttā.
tika-s0301t0:1093_1: Na hi kāci buddhānaṃ desanā niratthakā.
tika-s0301t0:1093_12: Bhavaṅgapaññāya pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgacalanaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti,
tika-s0301t0:1093_14: Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā.
tika-s0301t0:1094_0: Nibbānassa dvāraṃ pavisanamaggo vivaritvā ṭhapito mahākaruṇūpanissayena sayambhuñāṇena adhigatattā.
tika-s0301t0:1094_1: Saddhaṃ pamuñcantūti attano saddhaṃ dhammasampaṭicchanayogyaṃ katvā vissajjentu,
tika-s0301t0:1095_0: Satthu santikaṃ upagatānaṃ devānaṃ brahmānañca tassa purato antaradhānaṃ nāma atiṭṭhananti āha “sakaṭṭhānameva gato”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1095_1: Saddhindriyādi sammādiṭṭhiādiko dhammo eva vineyyasantāne pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1095_4: Atha vā atthadhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ pavattanaṭṭhena cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1098_1: Ayaṃ vitakkoti ayaṃ “kintāhaṃ vihareyya”nti evaṃ pavattitavitakko.
tika-s0301t0:1098_3: Attā na hotīti hi añño, paro.
tika-s0301t0:1098_4: So panettha na yo koci adhippeto,
tika-s0301t0:1099_1: Sadevakaggahaṇena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā,
tika-s0301t0:1099_3: Tattha hi māro jāto tannivāsī ca hoti.
tika-s0301t0:1099_6: Nidassanamattañcetaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ asamitapāpānaṃ abāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ teneva vacanena gahitattā.
tika-s0301t0:1099_7: Kāmaṃ “sadevake”tiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1099_8: “Salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1099_9: Devabhāvasāmaññena mārabrahmesu gahitesupi itarehi tesaṃ labbhamānavisesadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇanti dassento “māro nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:1099_14: Idha dīghanikāyādayo viya bāhirakānampi ganthanikāyo labbhatīti āha “ekanikāyādivasenā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1100_5: Sadevamanussāyāti vā iminā sammutidevaggahaṇaṃ tadavasiṭṭhamanussalokaggahaṇañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1100_6: Evaṃ bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni abhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1100_9: Sīlasampannataranti ettha paripuṇṇasampannatā adhippetā “sampannaṃ sālikedāra”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0301t0:1101_0: Kāraṇantiādīsu kāraṇanti yuttiṃ. Atthanti aviparītatthaṃ. Vuḍḍhinti abhivuḍḍhinimittaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1102_0: Iminā vacanenāti imasmiṃ sutte anantaraṃ vuttavacanena.
tika-s0301t0:1102_2: suttantarampi ānetvā paṭibāhitabboti dassento “na me ācariyo atthī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:1105_6: So pana yadi āgamanato paṭṭhāya labbhati,
tika-s0301t0:1105_9: evampi vaṭṭatevāti dassetuṃ “yathā vā tathā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1105_10: Aggamaggādhigamena asammohapaṭivedhassa sikhāppattattā maggadhammesu viya phaladhammesupi sātisayo asammohoti
tika-s0301t0:1105_12: Yathā jānanā panassa sacchikaraṇaṃ attapaccakkhakiriyāti “sacchikatvā”ti vuttanti āha “paccakkhaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1105_13: Tathā sacchikiriyā cassa vipassanāpaṭilābhoti “upasampajjā”ti vuttanti āha “paṭilabhitvā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1106_0: Jāti khīṇāti ettha jātisīsena tabbikāravanto khandhā vuttā.
tika-s0301t0:1106_1: Pubbeva khīṇattāti maggādhigamanato pageva atītabhāveneva khīṇattā.
tika-s0301t0:1106_5: Na paccuppannā vijjamānattāti saṃkiliṭṭhā ca maggabhāvanāti siyāti vacanaseso.
tika-s0301t0:1106_6: Yathā ajātaphalataruṇarukkhamūle chinne āyatiuppajjanārahāni phalāni chedanapaccayā anuppajjamānāni naṭṭhāni nāma honti,
tika-s0301t0:1106_7: evameva bhāvanāya asati uppajjanārahā kilesā tappaccayā jāti ca maggabhāvanāya sati na uppajjamānā pahīnāti
tika-s0301t0:1107_2: Pāḷiyaṃ sapadānanti sapadānacāro vutto bhāvanapuṃsakaniddesenāti āha “sapadānacāra”nti.
tika-s0301t0:1109_0: Atidevapattopi pañcakhandhūpadhīnaṃ atthitāya kilesūpadhiādīnaṃyeva virahitabhāvo gahito.
tika-s0301t0:1109_1: Aññatra hi bhāvapaccayaṃ tadattho viññāyatīti āha “atidevabhāvaṃ patto”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1110_0: Attānaṃ bhāvetvāti sīlādīhi guṇehi attānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paribrūhitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0301t0:1111_1: Khīṇāsavā thāvarā nāma sabbaso gatīsu sañcaraṇābhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1111_2: Tathā hi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ sabbaso adiṭṭhattā bhavadāyajjassa taṇhādāsabyassa bhāvato ekaccāsu gatīsu sañcaraṇasabhāvato sekkhā thāvarā na honti.
tika-s0301t0:1111_4: Thāvarapakkhameva bhajanti sabbaseṭṭhapakkhaṃ ekantapasaṭṭhaṃ bhajamānabhāvaṃ upādāya.
tika-s0301t0:1112_0: Pahīnakileso khīṇāsavo viseno. Sukhaṃ āyati sukhāyati, tassa kārakaṃ sukhāyatikaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1115_1: “Sassato attā ca loko cā”ti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0301t0:1115_14: upapajjanako vā natthi niccabhāvato ṭhānena saddhiṃ tannivāsīnaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1116_2: Heṭṭhupapattikaṃ katvāti yathāṭhitabhūmito heṭṭhā tatiyajjhānabhūmiyaṃ upapattijhānaṃ katvā,
tika-s0301t0:1116_6: Ubhayanti taṃ taṃ attanā katakammañceva nibbattaṭṭhānañcāti ubhayaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1118_3: Satiṃ labhitvāti teneva santajjanena yoniso ummujjitvā purimajātivisayaṃ satiṃ labhitvā.
tika-s0301t0:1118_4: Nippīḷitukāmoti ghaṃsetukāmo dosaṃ dassetukāmo “idaṃ passa yāvañca te aparaddha”nti.
tika-s0301t0:1118_11: Abhibhūti taṃ brahmalokaṃ jeṭṭhakabhāvena abhibhavitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0301t0:1118_19: Seṭṭho sajitāti ayaṃ lokassa uttamo saṃvibhajitā ca.
tika-s0301t0:1118_21: ayaṃ pitā bhūtānaṃ nibbattānaṃ bhabyānaṃ sambhavesīnanti patthenti vikatthenti pihenti mānenti.
tika-s0301t0:1119_0: Etanti viparītasaññāvasena “idaṃ niccaṃ idaṃ dhuvaṃ idaṃ sassata”ntiādinā vuttaṃ etaṃ appaṃ parittakanti taṃ bhagavā paricchinditvā dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:1119_1: Taṃ pana “ekasmiṃ kosalake tilavāhe vassasate vassasate ekekatiluddhāre kayiramāne tilāni parikkhayaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0301t0:1119_2: na tveva abbude āyū”ti evaṃ vutto abbudo,
tika-s0301t0:1119_6: vitthārato pana padume āyuno vassagaṇanā imasmiṃyeva saṃyutte parato āgamissati.
tika-s0301t0:1119_8: Vatasīlavattanti samādānavasena vatabhūtaṃ cārittasīlavasena samāciṇṇattā sīlavattaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1120_0: Apāyesīti ettha yadā so pipāsite manusse pānīyaṃ pāyesi,
tika-s0301t0:1120_3: Esa brahmā “jarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissāmī”ti ajjhāsayavasena jhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmaloke nibbatti,
tika-s0301t0:1120_5: Jhānaratiyā vītināmetīti tadā tassā kiriyāya avicchedato pavattiṃ upādāya vattamānapayogo.
tika-s0301t0:1120_6: Rattandhakāre purato purato gacchantassa sakaṭassa anussaraṇavasena gacchantānaṃ sakaṭānaṃ nivattanaṃ
tika-s0301t0:1121_3: “Eṇimigabahulatāya so gaṅgāya tīrappadeso eṇikūlanti vutta”nti apare.
tika-s0301t0:1122_4: idha mayhaṃ pamuṭṭhañca sabbaṃ jānāsīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:1122_5: Sabbaṃ brahmalokaṃ obhāsayanto sabbampimaṃ brahmalokaṃ bhagavā obhāsaṃ abhibhavitvā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ attano obhāsaṃ obhāsento tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0301t0:1125_1: Tejokasiṇaparikammaṃ katvāti “tejokasiṇaparikammajjhānaṃ samāpajjissāmī”ti cittuppādo evettha tejokasiṇaparikammaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1125_2: Na hi buddhānaṃ aññesaṃ viya tattha jhānasamāpajjanena parikammapapañco atthi sabbattheva ciṇṇavasībhāvassa paramukkaṃsabhāvappattattā.
tika-s0301t0:1125_3: Tassa kira brahmuno “yathāhaṃ evaṃ mahānubhāvo añño natthī”ti laddhi,
tika-s0301t0:1125_7: Bhagavā tassa taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjetuṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā tassa upari ākāse nisīdi.
tika-s0301t0:1125_11: yathā aṭṭhiṃ vijjhitvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0301t0:1126_0: Aññabrahmasarīravimānālaṅkārādīnaṃ pabhāti brahmānaṃ sarīrappabhā vimānappabhā alaṅkāravatthādīnaṃ pabhāti
tika-s0301t0:1126_1: imasmiṃ brahmaloke imā sabbā pabhā attano pabhassarabhāvena abhibhavantaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1126_2: Natthi me sāti idāni me sā diṭṭhi natthi,
tika-s0301t0:1126_4: yo idha āgaccheyyā”ti ayaṃ laddhi natthi.
tika-s0301t0:1126_8: Yathā tassa brahmuno sabbaso diṭṭhigataṃ vimuccati dhammacakkhu uppajjati,
tika-s0301t0:1127_3: dutiyena ekanti evaṃ pañca abhiññā sarūpena vuttā.
tika-s0301t0:1127_7: na tassa dibbasotasampādanaṃ bhāriyaṃ paṭipakkhavigamena sukheneva ijjhanato.
tika-s0301t0:1130_4: Tesu hi eko paccekabrahmā gandhakuṭiyā ekadvārabāhaṃ nissāya ṭhito,
tika-s0301t0:1130_10: Sampattiyā vepullappattatā brahmānañca abhiññāguṇehi vepullappattīti āha “phītoti abhiññāpupphehi supupphito”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1131_6: “Kassa aññassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmī”ti vimānasampattiyaṃ vimhayakkhiko ahaṅkāravasena vadati.
tika-s0301t0:1131_8: Virodhipaccayasannipāte vikāruppatti ruppanaṃ rūpassa pavedhananti āha “sītādīhi ca niccaṃ pavedhita”nti.
tika-s0301t0:1131_9: Sumedho sundarapañño so satthā rūpe na ramati,
tika-s0301t0:1131_10: kiṃ pana mandapañño rūpe saraṇañca pavedhitañca apassanto ramasīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:1134_1: Pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ abhāvato khīṇāsavo rāgādivasena na sakkā imaṃ pamātunti appameyyo,
tika-s0301t0:1134_2: appameyyāni vā cattāri ariyasaccāni vijjhitvā ṭhitattā pamitaṃ pameyyaṃ tassa kato parimeyyo natthi.
tika-s0301t0:1137_0: 179. Kiṃ kusalagavesitāya “kiṃ kusalaṃ akusala”ntiādinā kinti suṇāti etāyāti kissa vā vuccati paññā.
tika-s0301t0:1140_5: Piyasīlāti iminā etasmiṃ atthe niruttinayena “pesalā”ti padasiddhīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:1140_7: Yattakanti yaṃ tvaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ aññathā karosi,
tika-s0301t0:1140_10: Yasmā anāgāmino nāma kāmacchandabyāpādā pahīnā honti,
tika-s0301t0:1140_12: tasmā yāva te idaṃ aparaddhanti ayamevettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t0:1141_1: Gilaviso viya visaṃ gilitvā ṭhito viya.
tika-s0301t0:1141_4: Khīṇāsavoti vadati sunakkhatto viya acelaṃ korakkhattiyaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1141_7: Samakova vipākoti pasaṃsiyanindā vijjamānaguṇaparidhaṃsanavasena pavattā yāva mahāsāvajjatāya kaṭukataravipākā,
tika-s0301t0:1141_8: tāva nindiyapasaṃsāpi mahāsāvajjatāya samavipākā tattha avijjamānaguṇasamāropanena attano paresaṃ micchāpaṭipattihetubhāvato
tika-s0301t0:1141_10: Lokepi hi ayaṃ pure samaṇagārayho hoti,
