tika-s0301t0:1606_1: Taṃ khantiṃ paramaṃ āhu seṭṭhabalaṃ virodhapaccayaṃ abhibhuyya pavattanato.
tika-s0301t0:1606_5: Taṃ yassa balanti taṃ aññāṇabalaṃ yassa puggalassa balaṃ,
tika-s0301t0:1606_7: Paṭivattā na vijjatīti dhammaṭṭhaṃ paṭippharitvā abhibhavitvā pavattā natthi.
tika-s0301t0:1606_14: “Bālo aya”nti evaṃ paññapetuṃ hetuphalānaṃ anavabodhato catusaccadhamme achekāti.
tika-s0301t0:1609_1: “Chekatāyā”ti vatvā tassa vattuṃ chekabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ kirassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:1609_3: Mocetvāti yassa puna “coro”ti uttari vattuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0301t0:1609_4: evaṃ vimocetvāti paṭhamaṃ vattuṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0301t0:1609_7: Pacchāti “parassā”ti vutto so kiñci paṭhamaṃ vadanto attano adhippāyaṃ pavedeti nāma,
tika-s0301t0:1609_8: taṃ yathāsatti viditamano tassa uttari vattuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0301t0:1609_9: Tenāha “parassa vacanaṃ anugantvā pana pacchā sukhaṃ vattu”nti.
tika-s0301t0:1609_14: Vacasi kusalo sakko devarājā taṃ visesaṃ teneva pubbaṃ upanayāpento upalāpanavasena “tumhe khvetthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:1609_15: Pubbadevāti sakkapamukhāya devaparisāya loke pubbeva uppannattā “pubbadevā”ti pasaṃsavacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1609_16: Vepacittiṃ sandhāya “tumhe”ti “pubbadevā”ti ca vuttattā “tumhākaṃ tāva paveṇiāgataṃ bhaṇathā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1612_6: Puññapaccayanibbattoti uḷāraṃ suvipulaṃ puññaṃ paccayaṃ katvā nibbatto.
tika-s0301t0:1612_9: Vibhaggaṃ nimmathitanti ito cito vibhaggañceva niravasesato mathitañca hoti.
tika-s0301t0:1615_4: Cetiyarājā kira imasmiṃ kappe tato pubbe kenaci avuttapubbaṃ kharamusāvādaṃ abhāsi,
tika-s0301t0:1615_5: tāvadeva virajjhitvā mahāpathaviyā vivare dine nipatitvā avīciaggijālānamindanamahosi.
tika-s0301t0:1615_8: Tathā hi vepacittino sapathakaraṇe nidassanabhāvena etāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatānīti.
tika-s0301t0:1618_5: Sabbe hi anipphannā atthā na sobhanti.
tika-s0301t0:1618_7: Akiccajātoti asañjātakicco kiccarahito nāma natthi gamanaṭṭhitasayananisajjādivasena uppajjanakadukkhavinodanabhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1618_8: Saṃyogaparamātveva sambhogāti imesaṃ sattānaṃ saṃbhuñjitabbavatthūni nāma pakatiyā virodhasīlānipi asaṃyogena vā asundarānipi,
tika-s0301t0:1618_9: tāni abhisaṅkharaṇapacanasaṃyojanaparamāni veditabbāni tathā sati sambhogārahabhāvūpagamanato.
tika-s0301t0:1621_3: tasmā ime antaravattino dve janā sakkavepacittino sujāya vasena jāmātikasasurā.
tika-s0301t0:1621_4: “Ciradikkhitāna”nti dikkhitvā pabbajitvā cirakālānaṃ vatasamādānavasena ito bāhirakānaṃ pabbajitānanti āha “cirasamādinnavatāna”nti.
tika-s0301t0:1621_5: Ito paṭikkamāti ito yathāṭhitaṭṭhānato apehi apakkama.
tika-s0301t0:1621_7: Devā hi yebhuyyena “mayaṃ pubbe guṇavante payirupāsitvā tesaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā puññāni upacinitvā idhūpapannā”ti guṇavantesu ādarabhāvaṃ upaṭṭhapenti.
tika-s0301t0:1624_2: Yatheva sinerusamīpe mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro,
tika-s0301t0:1624_7: Evaṃ cintayiṃsūti “yaṃ nūna maya”ntiādinā yathā pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-s0301t0:1625_2: Te pana duṭṭhajjhāsayā viruddhā hontīti āha “duṭṭhānaṃ viruddhāna”nti.
tika-s0301t0:1626_1: Yathāvāraṃ bhakkhitametaṃ devānaṃ viya sukhumaṃ guruvāsañca na hotīti “bhatta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1631_4: Samattānīti puññavisesatāya pujjabhavaphalanibbattanena kittisaññānena ca samaṃ attāni samattāni.
tika-s0301t0:1631_8: na yā kāci mātulassa bhariyā kulajeṭṭhakānaṃ adhippetattā,
tika-s0301t0:1632_5: ayaṃ pana na evanti “muttacāgo hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1632_8: tathā dānabahulo “payatapāṇī”ti vuttoti āha “deyyadhammadānatthāya sadā dhotahattho”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1632_10: Parehi yācitabbārahoti parehi yācituṃ yutto icchitassa atthassa tāvadeva vissajjanato.
tika-s0301t0:1632_11: Dāneneva yuttoti sabbakālaṃ dāneneva yutto abhiṇhaṃ pavattamahādānattā.
tika-s0301t0:1632_12: Dāne ca saṃvibhāge cāti parassa sampuṇṇaṃ katvā pariccajanasaṅkhāte dāne ca attanā paribhuñjitabbato saṃvibhajanasaṅkhāte saṃvibhāge ca rato abhirato.
tika-s0301t0:1635_10: taṃ pana saddhāsaṅkhātaṃ maghaṃ assa atthīti maghavā.
tika-s0301t0:1635_11: Pure dānaṃ dadātīti purindado anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0301t0:1638_5: Yathā paṭipajjanto anukkamena te dhamme samādiyitvā sakko sakkattaṃ ajjhagā,
tika-s0301t0:1641_4: Tasmiṃ ṭhāneti tassa devaputtassa tasmiṃ uppajjanaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0301t0:1641_5: Lāmakato cintentīti tassa purimavatthuṃ nissāya hīnato cintenti.
tika-s0301t0:1641_8: Sabbadā paricchijja parivārasampanno hutvā aḍḍhaṭṭharatane hatthikkhandhe mahaccarājānubhāvena nisinnattā janakāyena samullokiyamāno.
tika-s0301t0:1641_14: Kāḷarattehi suttehi sibbitattā vaṇṇavikāraṃ disvā “kuṭṭhicīvarāni pāruto”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:1641_19: tassa pana akusalakammassa vipākino balavabhāvato vuttaṃ “vipākāvasesenā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1641_22: Bhikkhāya carituṃ samatthakālato paṭṭhāya rogassa balavatāya maṃsāni…pe… patanti.
tika-s0301t0:1641_23: Ñāṇaṃ pesetvāti vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā bhāvanāñāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭipesetvā pavattetvā.
tika-s0301t0:1641_24: Indriyānaṃ paripakkattā satthu desanāvilāsena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0301t0:1641_26: Kuṭṭhino hi sakalapādatalaṃ mā rujīti cumbaṭaṃ katvā taṃ pādatale bandhitvā gacchanti,
tika-s0301t0:1641_27: mattikapātiṃ bhinditvā viya tathā nihīnamanussattabhāvato cavitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ paṭilabhanto viya devattabhāvaṃ
tika-s0301t0:1641_28: gaṇhanto cuticittato dutiyacittavāre ādānacittakkhaṇe devaloke nibbatto.
tika-s0301t0:1642_1: Ariyakantasīlanti ariyānaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ manoramaṃ sīladhammaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1642_2: Ariyānaṃ adhicittaadhipaññāsikkhā viya adhisīlasikkhāpi sabbā ativiya kantā evāti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t0:1642_3: Imasmiṃ panattheti imasmiṃ sotāpannassa bhavasaṅkhāte atthe niddhāretvā vuccamāne.
tika-s0301t0:1642_4: Pañcasīlampi yasmā diṭṭhi viya bhavantarepi appahīnaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1645_3: Te eva cetenti ettha saddhāya attano pītisomanassaṃ sandhahantīti cetiyāti ca vuccanti.
tika-s0301t0:1645_5: Tassa pana sīlādiguṇavasena acinteyyāparimeyyānubhāvatāpi hotīti bhagavā “nāgghanti soḷasi”nti avoca.
tika-s0301t0:1645_6: Acetanāya bhūmiyā ramaṇīyatā nāma guṇavisiṭṭhānaṃ ariyānaṃ sevanavasena veditabbāti vuttaṃ “idāni…pe…
tika-s0301t0:1648_2: Aṭṭhuppattiko suttanikkhepoti dassetvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “tadā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1648_4: Tehi tehi vā yathāladdhasappiādayo mā nassantu,
tika-s0301t0:1648_5: aggabhāvena gahitāni sappiādīni kevalaṃ aggimhi jhāpanena,
tika-s0301t0:1649_3: Bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu “sammāsambuddhena mahābrahmunā ca evaṃ ovādo dinno”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1652_6: Vitthārato pana āyāmato ca anekayojanasatasahassaparimāṇacakkavāḷaṃ atibyāpetvā ṭhitassa.
tika-s0301t0:1652_9: Te hi taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa sampātanaṭṭhena bhārā nāma.
tika-s0301t0:1652_12: Pannarasāya puṇṇamāya rattinti yathā pannarasapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃ paripuṇṇakāle upakkilesavimutto cando sobhati,
tika-s0301t0:1652_13: evaṃ tava cittaṃ sabbaso upakkilesavimuttaṃ sobhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:1655_2: Kā pana tāti āha “catasso disā catasso anudisā cā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1655_3: Anudisāgahaṇena cettha uddhaṃ adhopi gayhatīti ca dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:1655_6: Cirarattasamāhitacitteti upacārappanājhānāni uppādetvā aparihīnajjhānatāya cirakālaṃ samāhitacitte.
tika-s0301t0:1655_12: saddena tato katipayehi uposathasīlavasena aṭṭhahipīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t0:1658_1: Brahmajāṇukoti dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapetvā vandamāno brahmajāṇuko nāma tathābhūto hutvā.
tika-s0301t0:1658_3: Evaṃ pūjāvisesayogato sakkoti āha “so yakkhoti so sakko”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1658_4: Sakkassa namakkārabhājanabhūtañhi pucchanto mātali “ko nāma so yakkho”ti āha.
tika-s0301t0:1658_5: Guṇanemittakehīti guṇahetukehi anantāni hi buddhānaṃ nāmāni,
tika-s0301t0:1664_2: attano eva vā pūtidehaṃ sarīraṃ tasmiṃ ṭhitatāya avattharitvā sayanato pūtidehasayāti yojanā.
tika-s0301t0:1664_3: Kuṇapamheteti ete manussā asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūle mātukucchisaṅkhāte kuṇapasmiṃ dasa māse nimuggā.
tika-s0301t0:1664_5: Etesaṃ etaṃ vihayāmīti etesaṃ isīnaṃ etaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ vihayāmi.
tika-s0301t0:1664_6: Idāni taṃ paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ “na te saṃ koṭṭhe opentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1664_7: Dhaññaṃ koṭṭhe na pakkhipanti pakkhipitabbassa ca abhāvato.
tika-s0301t0:1664_9: Paresaṃ niṭṭhitanti paresaṃ gahitaṃ santakaṃ tesaṃ pākāya niṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1665_0: Evaṃ subhāsitabhāsinoti ganthadhuravipassanādhurānaṃ vasena guṇaparimāṇasubhāsitasseva bhāsanasīlā.
tika-s0301t0:1673_4: na pana so tathārūpo koci yakkho.
tika-s0301t0:1673_6: Yadi evaṃ kasmā so tathārūpo hutvā āgatoti āha “sakko kirā”ti.
tika-s0301t0:1673_8: na paneso avaruddhakayakkho”ti yuttiṃ dassento “avaruddhakayakkhā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t0:1673_11: “Ko nāma mayhaṃ āsane sannisinno”ti akkhantiṃ anuppādento khantiyaṃ ṭhatvā.
tika-s0301t0:1673_14: Sakkassa tāya eva ācārasampattiyā sakkāsane ṭhātuṃ,
tika-s0301t0:1673_16: Upahatacittomhīti khantimettānuddayāsabbhāvato parasmiṃ upahatacittomhīti sakko attano sabhāvaṃ vadati.
tika-s0301t0:1673_17: Kodhavase vattetunti kodhena attano vase nibbattetuṃ na sukaromhi,
tika-s0301t0:1673_18: atha kho kodhaṃ mayhaṃ vase na vattemīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t0:1673_19: Ciraṃ na kujjhāmīti yadi me kadāci kodho uppajjeyya,
tika-s0301t0:1673_20: taṃ kodhaṃ anuvattento cirakālaṃ na kujjhāmi.
tika-s0301t0:1673_21: Na upanayhāmīti anto sace me kodho uppajjeyya,
tika-s0301t0:1673_22: khippameva ca naṃ paṭivineyyanti taṃ me pubbeva vataṃ paripūritaṃ.
tika-s0301t0:1676_3: Sambaro nāma asuramāyāya ādipuriso purātano asurindo.
tika-s0301t0:1676_5: Evaṃ paccati aññopi māyāvī māyaṃ payojetvā.
tika-s0301t0:1676_9: Tathā akatvāti isīnaṃ santikaṃ netvā khamāpanavasena kātabbaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0301t0:1679_5: Yasmā accaye desiyamāne taṃ khīṇayati aññamaññassa khamamānassa khamanaṃ paṭiggaṇhato,
tika-s0301t0:1679_13: evaṃ mittabhāvato vuttavipariyāyo amittadhammo jarāpariyāyena vutto.
tika-s0301t0:1682_1: Kodho tumhe mā abhibhavīti ettha kodhena anabhibhavanīyattaṃ khantimettākaruṇāditappaṭipakkhadhammaparibrūhanena.
tika-s0301t0:1682_2: Tathā hi taṃsamaṅgino kodho abhibhuyyatīti āha “tumheva kodhaṃ abhibhavatha.
tika-s0301t0:1682_10: Lāmakajananti khantiādīsu yonisomanasikārābhāvena gārayhasamācārasamāyogena ca nihīnaṃ janaṃ.
